  2524                                  ;************************************************************************
  2525                                  ;*									*
  2526                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2527                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2528                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2529                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2530                                  ;*									*
  2531                                  ;************************************************************************
  2532                                  
  2533                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2534 0000071E 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2535 00000724 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2536                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2537 00000726 50                      		push	ax
  2538 00000727 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2539 0000072B 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2540 00000730 58                      		pop	ax
  2541 00000731 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2542                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2543                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2544                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2545 00000733 2EFF2E[BD06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2546                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2547                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2548                                  
  2549                                  not_from_dos:				
  2550 00000738 E85500                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2551 0000073B EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2552                                  
  2553                                  ;************************************************************************
  2554                                  ;*									*
  2555                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2556                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2557                                  ;*									*
  2558                                  ;************************************************************************
  2559                                  
  2560                                  ; 30/12/2022
  2561                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:0762h)
  2562                                  
  2563                                  outchr:					
  2564 0000073D 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2565 0000073E 56                      		push	si
  2566 0000073F 57                      		push	di
  2567 00000740 55                      		push	bp
  2568 00000741 53                      		push	bx
  2569 00000742 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2570 00000744 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2571 00000747 CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2572                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2573                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2574 00000749 5B                      		pop	bx
  2575 0000074A 5D                      		pop	bp
  2576 0000074B 5F                      		pop	di
  2577 0000074C 5E                      		pop	si
  2578 0000074D 58                      		pop	ax
  2579 0000074E CF                      		iret
  2580                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2581                                  
  2582                                  ;************************************************************************
  2583                                  ;*									*
  2584                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2585                                  ;*									*
  2586                                  ;************************************************************************
  2587                                  
  2588                                  block13:				
  2589 0000074F 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2590 00000755 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2591 00000757 E84700                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2592 0000075A 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2593 0000075C E83600                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2594                                  
  2595                                  skipa20:				
  2596 0000075F 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2597 00000764 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2598 00000765 2EFF1E[C506]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2599                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2600                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2601 0000076A 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2602 0000076F CA0200                  		retf	2
  2603                                  
  2604                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2605                                  
  2606                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2607                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2608                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2609                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2610                                  
  2611                                  call_orig13:	; proc far		
  2612 00000772 8E1E[1C00]              		mov	ds, [i13_ds]	; get caller's ds register
  2613 00000776 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2614 00000777 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2615                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2616 0000077C 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2617 00000781 0E                      		push	cs
  2618 00000782 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2619                                  
  2620 00000783 9C                      		pushf
  2621                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2622                                  		; ds = cs
  2623 00000784 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2624                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2625 00000789 7403                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2626                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2627                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:0725h	
  2628                                  		;call	IsA20Off
  2629                                  		;jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2630                                  		;call	EnableA20
  2631 0000078B E80200                  		call	EnsureA20On ; 07/08/2023
  2632                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2633 0000078E 9D                      		popf
  2634                                  re_init:	; 07/08/2023
  2635 0000078F CB                      		retf
  2636                                  
  2637                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2638                                  
  2639                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  2640                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 5.0, IO.SYS) ; 16/10/2022
  2641                                  
  2642                                  ; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2643                                  ;HiMem:		dd 0FFFF0090h

  2650                                  
  2651                                  ;************************************************************************
  2652                                  ;*									*
  2653                                  ;*	EnsureA20On - ensure that a20 is enabled if we're running	*
  2654                                  ;*	  in the HMA before interrupt entry points into Bios_Code	*
  2655                                  ;*									*
  2656                                  ;************************************************************************
  2657                                  
  2658                                  EnsureA20On:	; proc near		
  2659 00000790 E80E00                  		call	IsA20Off
  2660                                  		;jz	short EnableA20
  2661                                  		;retn
  2662                                  		; 18/12/2022
  2663 00000793 750B                    		jnz	short A20On_retn	
  2664                                  
  2665                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2666                                  
  2667                                  
  2668                                  EnableA20:	; proc near		
  2669 00000795 50                      		push	ax
  2670 00000796 53                      		push	bx
  2671 00000797 B405                    		mov	ah, 5	 ; local enable a20
  2672                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2673 00000799 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms] ; 16/10/2022
  2674 0000079E 5B                      		pop	bx
  2675 0000079F 58                      		pop	ax
  2676                                  A20On_retn:	; 18/12/2022	
  2677 000007A0 C3                      		retn
  2678                                  
  2679                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2680                                  
  2681                                  
  2682                                  IsA20Off:	; proc near		
  2683 000007A1 1E                      		push	ds
  2684 000007A2 06                      		push	es
  2685 000007A3 51                      		push	cx
  2686 000007A4 56                      		push	si
  2687 000007A5 57                      		push	di
  2688                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2689                                  		;lds	si, [cs:HiMem]
  2690                                  		;les	di, [cs:LoMem]
  2691                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:0740h
  2692 000007A6 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  2693 000007A8 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  2694 000007AA 4F                      		dec	di
  2695 000007AB BE9000                  		mov	si, 90h	; 0FFFFh:0090h ; HiMem
  2696 000007AE 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  2697 000007B0 BF8000                  		mov	di, 80h ; 0000h:0080h ; LoMem
  2698 000007B3 B90800                  		mov	cx, 8
  2699 000007B6 F3A7                    		repe cmpsw
  2700                                  				; zf = 0 -> A20 line is ON
  2701                                  				; zf = 1 -> A20 line is OFF
  2702 000007B8 5F                      		pop	di

  2812                                  ; procedure : int15
  2813                                  ;
  2814                                  ;		Int15 handler for recognizing ctrl-alt-del seq
  2815                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  2816                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header
  2817                                  ;		present at 1MB boundary

  2839 00000804 50                      		push	ax
  2840                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2841                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:07A5h

  2851 0000080E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)

  2947                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  2948                                  
  2949                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  2950                                  ;
  2951                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  2952                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  2953                                  
  2954 0000083B 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  2955                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  2956 0000083D 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  2957 00000841 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  2958 00000845 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  2959 00000849 [4D08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  2960 0000084B 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  2961                                  
  2962                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  2963                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  2964                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  2965

  2967 00000851 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  2968 00000853 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  2969 00000857 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  2970 00000859 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  2971 0000085B 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  2972 0000085D 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  2973                                  
  2974                                  NextStack:
  2975                                  
  2976                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  2977                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  2978                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  2979                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  2980                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  2981                                  
  2982 0000085F 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  2983 00000863 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  2984 00000865 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  2985 00000869 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  2986 0000086B 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table

  2990                                  					; Win386 is running or not

  2997                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  2998 00000870 57                      		push	di
  2999 00000871 06                      		push	es
  3000 00000872 53                      		push	bx
  3001 00000873 50                      		push	ax

  3003 00000876 8EC7                    		mov	es, di

  3005 0000087B B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3006 0000087E CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3007                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3008                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3009 00000880 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3010 00000882 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3011 00000884 740B                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3012                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3013 00000886 0E                      		push	cs
  3014                                  		;mov	ax, offset Skip
  3015 00000887 B8[9108]                		mov	ax, Skip
  3016 0000088A 50                      		push	ax
  3017 0000088B 06                      		push	es
  3018 0000088C 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3019 0000088D B80100                  		mov	ax, 1		; SetFocus function number
  3020 00000890 CB                      		retf			; do the call

  3300 0000126A 202020200000000000-     		db 20h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0, 0, 0,	0, 0, 46h, 41h,	54h, 31h
  3300 00001273 46415431           
  3301 00001277 3220202000              		db 32h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0
  3302 0000127C 00                      		db 0
  3303                                  
  3304                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3305                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3306                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3307                                  
  3308                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3309                                  
  3310                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3311                                  ;
  3312                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3313                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3314                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3315                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3316                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3317                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3318                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3319                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3320                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3321                                  ;
  3322                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3323                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3324                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3325                                  ;
  3326                                  ;	uses:	
  3327                                  ;
  3328                                  ;
  3329                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3330                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3331                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3332                                  ;
  3333                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3334                                  
  3335                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3336                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3337                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3338                                  
  3339                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3340                                  
  3341                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3342                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3343                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3344                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3345                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3346                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3347                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3348                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3349                                  
  3350                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3351                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3352                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3353                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3354                                  
  3355                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3356                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3357                                  
  3358                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3359 0000127D 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3360 00001280 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3361 00001282 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3362 00001285 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3363 00001287 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3364 0000128A 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3365                                  atd1:
  3366 0000128C 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3367                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3368                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3369                                  
  3370                                  atd2:					
  3371 00001291 53                      		push	bx
  3372 00001292 51                      		push	cx
  3373 00001293 52                      		push	dx
  3374 00001294 57                      		push	di
  3375 00001295 1E                      		push	ds
  3376 00001296 06                      		push	es
  3377 00001297 50                      		push	ax
  3378 00001298 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3379                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3380 0000129B 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3381                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3382 0000129D C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3383                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3384                                  					; initially no error code.
  3385 000012A2 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3386 000012A5 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3387                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3388 000012A9 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3389                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3390 000012AB C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3391 000012B0 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3392                                  					; return
  3393                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3394                                  
  3395                                  atd3:					
  3396 000012B2 53                      		push	bx
  3397 000012B3 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3398 000012B5 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3399 000012B8 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3400 000012BA 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3401 000012BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  3402 000012BD 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3403 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
  3404 000012C1 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3405 000012C4 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3406 000012C6 58                      		pop	ax
  3407 000012C7 50                      		push	ax
  3408 000012C8 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3409 000012CB BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3410 000012CE EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3411 000012CF E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3412                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3413                                  
  3414                                  atd4:	
  3415                                  
  3416                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3417                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3418                                  				
  3419 000012D2 58                      		pop	ax
  3420                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3421 000012D3 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3422 000012D7 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3423 000012D9 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3424 000012DB F9                      		stc
  3425                                  atd5:					
  3426 000012DC 07                      		pop	es
  3427 000012DD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3428 000012DE 5F                      		pop	di
  3429 000012DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  3430 000012E0 59                      		pop	cx
  3431 000012E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3432 000012E2 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3433                                  
  3434                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3435                                  
  3436                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3437                                  ;
  3438                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3439                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3440                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3441                                  ;	
  3442                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3443                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3444                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3445                                  ;
  3446                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3447                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3448                                  ;
  3449                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3450                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3451                                  
  3452                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3453                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3454                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3455 000012E5 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3456                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3457 000012E8 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3458 000012ED 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3459 000012F0 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3460 000012F2 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3461                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3462                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3463                                  setc1:					
  3464 000012F7 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3465 000012F9 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3466                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3467                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3468 000012FB A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3469 000012FE 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3470 00001302 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3471 00001304 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3472                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3473 00001307 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3474 0000130A 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3475 0000130C C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3476 0000130F 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3477 00001312 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3478 00001314 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3479                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3480 00001316 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3481 00001319 06                      		push	es
  3482 0000131A 53                      		push	bx
  3483 0000131B 0E                      		push	cs
  3484 0000131C E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3485 0000131F 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3486                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3487 00001323 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3488                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3489 00001326 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3490                                  					; only use low part
  3491 00001329 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3492                                  					; control byte modifier
  3493 0000132D 5B                      		pop	bx
  3494 0000132E 07                      		pop	es
  3495                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3496 0000132F 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3497 00001333 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3498 00001336 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3499                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3500 00001338 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3501 0000133C C3                      		retn
  3502                                  
  3503                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3504                                  
  3505                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3506                                  ;
  3507                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3508                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3509                                  ;
  3510                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3511                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3512                                  ;
  3513                                  ;	
  3514                                  ;
  3515                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3516                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3517                                  ;
  3518                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3519                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3520                                  
  3521                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3522 0000133D 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3523 0000133F 0E                      		push	cs
  3524 00001340 E84000                  		call	command
  3525 00001343 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3526                                  doc1:					
  3527 00001345 0E                      		push	cs
  3528 00001346 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3529 00001349 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3530 0000134B B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3531 0000134E BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3532 00001351 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3533 00001352 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3534                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3535                                  
  3536                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3537                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3538                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3539                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3540                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3541                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3542                                  ;
  3543                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3544                                  
  3545                                  rsct_loop:				
  3546 00001353 6D                      		insw
  3547 00001354 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3548 00001356 FB                      		sti
  3549                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3550 00001357 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3551                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3552                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3553 0000135C 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3554 0000135E 0E                      		push	cs
  3555 0000135F E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3556 00001362 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3557 00001364 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3558 00001367 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3559 0000136A FA                      		cli
  3560 0000136B F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3561 0000136D FB                      		sti
  3562                                  doc2:					
  3563 0000136E 0E                      		push	cs
  3564 0000136F E82900                  		call	check_status
  3565 00001372 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3566                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3567 00001374 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3568 00001378 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3569                                  doc3:					
  3570 0000137A C3                      		retn
  3571                                  
  3572                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3573                                  
  3574                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3575                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3576                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3577                                  
  3578                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3579                                  
  3580                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3581                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3582                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3583                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3584                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3585                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3586                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3587                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3588                                  
  3589                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3590                                  ;
  3591                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3592                                  ;
  3593                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3594                                  ;
  3595                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3596                                  ;
  3597                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3598                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3599                                  ;	
  3600                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3601                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3602                                  
  3603                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3604                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3605                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3606                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3607 0000137B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3608 0000137E EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3609                                  
  3610                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================

  3618                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.

  3640                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3641                                  ;
  3642                                  ;

  3644                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3645                                  ;		
  3646                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3647

  3650                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh

  3716                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3717                                  
  3718                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3719                                  ;;
  3720                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3721                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3722                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3723                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3724                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3725                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3726                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3727                                  
  3728                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3729 000013AB 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3730                                  					;
  3731                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3732                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3733                                  					;
  3734                                  					; warning!!!
  3735                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3736 000013AE 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3737                                  no_hookit:				
  3738                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3739                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3740 000013B0 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3741                                  
  3742                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3743                                  
  3744                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3745 000013B5 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3746 000013B8 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3747 000013BA 1E                      		push	ds
  3748                                  		
  3749                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3750                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3751                                  		;push	ax
  3752                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3753                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3754                                  		;pop	ax
  3755 000013BB 6A40                    		push	40h
  3756 000013BD 1F                      		pop	ds
  3757                                  
  3758 000013BE 9C                      		pushf
  3759                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3760                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3761 000013BF 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3762 000013C4 1F                      		pop	ds
  3763 000013C5 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3764                                  
  3765                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3766                                  
  3767 000013C8 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3768                                  
  3769                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3770                                  
  3771                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3772                                  %if 0  
  3773                                  
  3774                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3775                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3776                                  
  3777                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3778                                  
  3779                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3780                                  ;
  3781                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3782                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3783                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3784                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3785                                  
  3786                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3787                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3788                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3789                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3790                                  		jnb	short century20
  3791                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3792                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3793                                  		jmp	short years
  3794                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3795                                  		
  3796                                  century20:				
  3797                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3798                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3799                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3800                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3801                                  years:					
  3802                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3803                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3804                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3805                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3806                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3807                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3808                                  		mov	bl, 4
  3809                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3810                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3811                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3812                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3813                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3814                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3815                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3816                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3817                                  regularyear:				
  3818                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3819                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3820                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3821                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3822                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  3823                                  					;
  3824                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3825                                  leapyear:				
  3826                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3827                                  					; change month table.
  3828                                  yeardone:				
  3829                                  		xor	bx, bx
  3830                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3831                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3832                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3833                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3834                                  		mov	cx, 12
  3835                                  months:					
  3836                                  		inc	bl
  3837                                  
  3838                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3839                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3840                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3841                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3842                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3843                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3844                                  		
  3845                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3846                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3847                                  					; dh=0
  3848                                  		jbe	short month_done
  3849                                  		inc	si		; next month
  3850                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3851                                  		loop	months		;
  3852                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3853                                  month_done:				
  3854                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3855                                  					; restore month table value
  3856                                  		mov	dl, bl
  3857                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3858                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3859                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3860                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3861                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3862                                  		xchg	dl, al
  3863                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3864                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3865                                  		xchg	dh, al
  3866                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3867                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3868                                  		xchg	cl, al
  3869                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3870                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3871                                  		mov	ch, al
  3872                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3873                                  		retf
  3874                                  
  3875                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3876                                  
  3877                                  %endif
  3878                                  
  3879                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3880                                  
  3881                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3882                                  %if 0  
  3883                                  
  3884                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3885                                  
  3886                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3887                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3888                                  		
  3889                                  		push	cx		
  3890                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  3891                                  		mov	cl, 4
  3892                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3893                                  		or	al, ah
  3894                                  		pop	cx
  3895                                  		retf
  3896                                  %endif
  3897                                  
  3898                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3899                                  
  3900                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3901                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3902                                  
  3903                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3904                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3905                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3906                                  
  3907                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3908                                  
  3909                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3910                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  3911                                  int_6Ch:
  3912 000013C9 0E                      		push	cs
  3913 000013CA 1F                      		pop	ds
  3914                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  3915 000013CB 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  3916 000013D0 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  3917 000013D2 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  3918 000013D5 FFD3                    		call    bx
  3919                                  int6c:					
  3920                                  		;push	cs
  3921                                  		;pop	ds
  3922 000013D7 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3923 000013DB 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3924 000013DF 9D                      		popf
  3925 000013E0 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3926 000013E3 FA                      		cli
  3927 000013E4 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3928 000013E8 FB                      		sti
  3929 000013E9 E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3930 000013EC FA                      		cli
  3931 000013ED B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3932 000013EF CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3933                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3934                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3935 000013F1 FB                      		sti
  3936                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3937                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3938 000013F2 FF2E[B306]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3939                                  
  3940                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3941                                  
  3942                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3943                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3944                                  
  3945                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3946 000013F6 50                      		push	ax
  3947 000013F7 51                      		push	cx
  3948 000013F8 52                      		push	dx
  3949 000013F9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3950 000013FB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3951                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3952                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3953                                  					; midnight
  3954                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  3955 000013FD 5A                      		pop	dx
  3956 000013FE 59                      		pop	cx
  3957 000013FF 58                      		pop	ax
  3958 00001400 50                      		push	ax
  3959 00001401 53                      		push	bx
  3960 00001402 51                      		push	cx
  3961 00001403 52                      		push	dx
  3962                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  3963                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3964                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  3965 00001404 C706[BB06]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  3966                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  3967 0000140A B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  3968 0000140C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3969                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  3970                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  3971                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  3972                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  3973 0000140E 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  3974 00001410 E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  3975                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3976                                  
  3977                                  read_ok:
  3978 00001413 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  3979 00001417 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  3980 0000141B 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  3981 0000141F 8816[BA06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  3982                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  3983                                  		; 08/08/2023
  3984                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  3985 00001423 FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  3986 00001427 E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  3987 0000142A 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  3988                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  3989                                  		; 08/08/2023
  3990                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  3991 0000142C FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  3992 00001430 E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  3993 00001433 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  3994                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  3995                                  		; 08/08/2023
  3996 00001435 C606[BB06]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  3997 0000143A E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  3998 0000143D A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  3999 00001440 98                      		cbw
  4000 00001441 803E[B706]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4001 00001446 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4002 00001448 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4003                                  century_19:				
  4004 0000144B 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4005 0000144E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4006 00001450 F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4007 00001452 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4008 00001454 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4009 00001455 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4010                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4011 00001458 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4012                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4013                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4014 0000145A A3[BB06]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax
  4015 0000145D 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4016 0000145F 98                      		cbw
  4017 00001460 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4018 00001462 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4019 00001464 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4020 00001467 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4021                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4022                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4023 00001469 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4024 0000146D EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4025                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4026                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4027                                  
  4028                                  leap_year:
  4029 0000146F 803E[B906]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4030 00001474 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4031                                  leap_adjustment:
  4032                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4033                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4034 00001476 FF06[BB06]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4035                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4036 0000147A 8A0E[BA06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4037 0000147E 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4038 00001480 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4039                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4040                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4041 00001481 010E[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], cx
  4042 00001485 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month

  4078                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  4080                                  r_t_retj:				
  4081 0000149F 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4082 000014A1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4083 000014A3 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4084                                  
  4085                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4086                                  
  4087                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4088                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4089                                  
  4090                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4091 000014A5 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4092 000014A7 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4093                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4094                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4095                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4096 000014A9 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4097 000014AB 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4098 000014AF 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4099 000014B3 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4100 000014B7 C606[BA06]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4101 000014BC E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4102 000014BF 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4103 000014C1 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4104 000014C4 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4105 000014C6 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4106 000014C9 8A2E[B706]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4107 000014CD 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4108 000014D1 8A36[B906]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4109 000014D5 8A16[BA06]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4110                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4111                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4112                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4113 000014D9 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4114                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4115                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4116                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4117                                  r_t_ret:				
  4118 000014DD C3                      		retn
  4119                                  
  4120                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4121                                  
  4122                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4123                                  
  4124                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4125 000014DE A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4126 000014E1 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4127 000014E4 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4128 000014E7 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4129 000014EA E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4130 000014ED A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4131 000014F0 A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4132 000014F3 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4133 000014F6 A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4134 000014F9 A0[BA06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4135 000014FC E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4136 000014FF A2[BA06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4137 00001502 C3                      		retn
  4138                                  
  4139                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4140                                  
  4141                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4142                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4143                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4144                                  
  4145                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4146 00001503 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4147 00001505 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4148 00001507 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4149 00001509 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4150 0000150B D50A                    		aad
  4151 0000150D C3                      		retn
  4152                                  
  4153                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4154                                  
  4155                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4156                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4157                                  
  4158                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4159 0000150E 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4160 00001513 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4161 00001515 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4162 00001517 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4163                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4164                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4165 0000151C 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4166 0000151E 803E[B806]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4167                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4168                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4169 00001523 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4170                                  century_20:
  4171 00001525 803E[B806]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4172 0000152A 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4173 0000152C 803E[B906]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4174 00001531 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4175 00001533 803E[B906]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4176                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4177 00001538 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4178 0000153A 803E[BA06]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4179 0000153F 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4180                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4181                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4182                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4183                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4184                                  		; cf=0
  4185                                  		;clc
  4186                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4187 00001541 803E[BA06]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4188 00001546 C3                      		retn
  4189                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4190                                  
  4191                                  date_error:
  4192 00001547 F9                      		stc
  4193                                  date_err2:
  4194 00001548 C3                      		retn
  4195                                  
  4196                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4197                                  
  4198                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4199                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4200

  4203 0000154E 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4204 00001550 803E[B806]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4205 00001555 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4206                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4207                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4208                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4209                                  		;clc
  4210                                  		;retn
  4211                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4212 00001557 803E[B906]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4213                                  time_error:
  4214                                  bv_error:
  4215 0000155C F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4216 0000155D C3                      		retn
  4217

  4223                                  
  4224                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4225                                  
  4226                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4227                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4228                                  
  4229                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4230 0000155E B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4231 00001561 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4232                                  bv_loop:
  4233 00001564 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4234 00001566 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4235 00001568 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4236                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4237 0000156B 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4238 0000156D 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4239 0000156F D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4240 00001571 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4241 00001573 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4242 00001575 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4243 00001577 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4244 0000157A 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4245 0000157D 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4246 0000157F 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4247 00001580 49                      		dec	cx
  4248 00001581 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4249 00001583 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4250 00001584 C3                      		retn
  4251                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4252                                  
  4253                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4254                                  ;bv_error:
  4255                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4256                                  		;retn
  4257                                  
  4258                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4259

  4262                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4263                                  
  4264                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4265                                  ;									:
  4266                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4267                                  ;									:
  4268                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4269                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4270                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4271                                  ;									:
  4272                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4273                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4274                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4275                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4276                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4277                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4278                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4279                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4280                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4281                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4282                                  ;		this program.						:
  4283                                  ;									:
  4284                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4285                                  
  4286                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4287                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4288

  4401                                  BPB48T:
  4402                                  ;bpb48t:	; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 112, 720, 0FDh, 2, 9, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4403                                  		; 48 tpi diskettes	;
  4404                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4405                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4406                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4407                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4408                                  		dw	112		; number of directory entries
  4409                                  		dw	720 ; 2*9*40	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4410                                  		db	0FDh		; media descriptor
  4411                                  		dw	2		; number of fat sectors
  4412                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4413                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4414                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4415                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4416                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4417                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)					
  4418
