  6915                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6916                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6917                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32)
  6918                                  		;   TmpVal2 = TmpVal2 / 2;
  6919                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6920                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6921                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32) {
  6922                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = 0;
  6923                                  		;   BPB_FATSz32 = FATSz;
  6924                                  		;} else {
  6925                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz);
  6926                                  		;/* there is no BPB_FATSz32 in a FAT16 BPB */
  6927                                  		;}

  6932 00001E85 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6933                                  
  6934                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6935

  6937                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))

  6939                                  					; number of fat	sectors

  7241                                  set_recbpb:

  7243                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  7244 00001FA8 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  7245 00001FAB F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  7246                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  7247 00001FAD 5F                      		pop	di
  7248 00001FAE 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  7249 00001FAF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7250 00001FB2 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7251 00001FB5 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7252 00001FB7 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7254                                  
  7255                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7256                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7257                                  		;retn
  7258                                  
  7259                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7260                                  
  7261                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7262                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7263                                  
  7264                                  ; al = device number
  7265                                  
  7266                                  print_init:	
  7267 00001FBA 98                      		cbw
  7268 00001FBB 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7269 00001FBD B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7270 00001FBF CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  7271                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7272                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7273                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7274 00001FC1 C3                      		retn
  7275                                  
  7276                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7277                                  
  7278                                  ; al = device number
  7279                                  
  7280                                  aux_init:
  7281 00001FC2 98                      		cbw
  7282 00001FC3 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7283                                  		;mov	al, 0A3h	; RSINIT ; 0A3h
  7284                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  7285                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  7286                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7287 00001FC5 B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  7288 00001FC8 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  7289                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7290                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  7291                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  7292                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  7293 00001FCA C3                      		retn
  7294

  7296                                  
  7297                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7298                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7299                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7300                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7301                                  
  7302                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7303                                  ;
  7304                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7305                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7306                                  ;
  7307                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7308                                  ;
  7309                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7310                                  ;   initialize it.
  7311                                  ;
  7312                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7313                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7314                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7315                                  ;
  7316                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7317                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7318                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7319                                  ;
  7320                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7321                                  ;   save coding.
  7322                                  ;
  7323                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7324                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7325                                  ;
  7326                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7327                                  ;
  7328                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7329                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7330                                  ;
  7331                                  ; called modules:
  7332                                  ;		  getboot
  7333                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7334                                  ;
  7335                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7336                                  ;
  7337                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7338                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7339                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7340                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7341                                  ;
  7342                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7343                                  
  7344                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7345                                  domini:	
  7346 00001FCB 8A36[0D16]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7347                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7348 00001FCF 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7349                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7350 00001FD1 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7351 00001FD3 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7352                                  domini_loop:				
  7353 00001FD5 52                      		push	dx
  7354 00001FD6 8816[0C16]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7355 00001FDA B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7356 00001FDC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7357                                  					; DL = drive number
  7358                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7359                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7360                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7361                                  		
  7362                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7363                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7364                                  		;inc	dh
  7365                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7366                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7367 00001FDE 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7368 00001FE0 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7369 00001FE2 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7370 00001FE3 A3[1216]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7371                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7372                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7373                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7374 00001FE6 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7375 00001FE8 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7376 00001FEB A3[1416]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7377 00001FEE 06                      		push	es
  7378 00001FEF 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7379 00001FF3 E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7380                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7381 00001FF6 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7382 00001FF8 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7383                                  domininext:				
  7384 00001FFB 07                      		pop	es
  7385 00001FFC 5A                      		pop	dx
  7386 00001FFD FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7387 00001FFF FECE                    		dec	dh
  7388 00002001 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7389                                  dominiret:				
  7390 00002003 C3                      		retn
  7391                                  
  7392                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7393                                  
  7394                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7395                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7396                                  
  7397                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7398                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7399                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7400                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7401                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7402                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7403                                  ;
  7404                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7405                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7406                                  
  7407                                  
  7408                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7409 00002004 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7410                                  fmpnext:				
  7411 00002008 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7412 0000200C 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7413 0000200E 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7414 00002011 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7415 00002015 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7416                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7417                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7418                                  fmpnextfound:
  7419 00002017 C3                      		retn
  7420                                  
  7421                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7422                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7423                                  ;fmpret:
  7424                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7425                                  
  7426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7427                                  
  7428                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7429                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7430 00002018 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7431 0000201B 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7432 0000201D 8B3E[1016]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7433 00002021 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7434                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7435 00002026 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7436                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7437                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7438 0000202A C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7439                                  					; ffHardFile
  7440 0000202E C606[8E15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7441 00002033 A1[1216]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7442 00002036 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7443 00002039 A1[1416]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7444 0000203C 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7445 0000203F A0[0C16]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7446 00002042 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7447                                  					; set physical number
  7448 00002045 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7449 00002048 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7450                                  					; set logical number
  7451 0000204B 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7452 00002050 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7453 00002052 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7454                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7455 00002057 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7456                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7457                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7458 00002059 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7459 0000205C 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7460 00002060 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7461 00002063 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7462 00002065 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7463 00002067 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7464 0000206B 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7465                                  					; set hidden trks
  7466 0000206E 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7467 00002072 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7468 00002076 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7469 0000207A BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7470 0000207D B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7471 00002080 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7472                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7473                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7474                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7475 00002082 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7476 00002084 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7477                                  
  7478                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7479                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7480 00002087 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7481 0000208D 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7482                                  
  7483                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7484                                  		;push	es
  7485 0000208F E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7486                                  					; bx value saved.
  7487                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7488 00002092 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7489 00002094 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7490                                  fmpnextchain:
  7491 00002097 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7492                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7493                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7494                                  
  7495                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7496                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7497                                  		;retn
  7498                                  
  7499                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7500                                  
  7501                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7502                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7503                                  
  7504                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7505                                  	
  7506 0000209A 57                      		push	di
  7507 0000209B 53                      		push	bx
  7508                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7509                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7510                                  		;push	ds
  7511 0000209C 06                      		push	es
  7512                                  setmini_1:				
  7513 0000209D 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7514 000020A1 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7515 000020A3 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7516 000020A7 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7517 000020A9 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7518 000020AD 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7519 000020AF 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7520 000020B2 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7521 000020B6 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7522 000020B8 F9                      		stc
  7523 000020B9 07                      		pop	es
  7524                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7525                                  		;pop	ds
  7526 000020BA 5B                      		pop	bx
  7527 000020BB 5F                      		pop	di
  7528 000020BC C3                      		retn
  7529                                  
  7530                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7531                                  setmini_2:
  7532 000020BD E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7533                                  
  7534                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7535                                  
  7536                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7537                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7538                                  
  7539                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7540                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7541                                  ;
  7542                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7543                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7544                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7545                                  ;
  7546                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7547                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7548                                  ;			trash ax
  7549                                  
  7550                                  dmax_check:
  7551 000020C0 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7552 000020C5 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7553 000020C7 06                      		push	es
  7554                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7555 000020C8 B84504                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7556 000020CB 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7557                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7558 000020CD 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7559                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7560                                  					; set message flag
  7561                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7562 000020D3 07                      		pop	es
  7563                                  
  7564                                  		;;push	es
  7565                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7566                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7567                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7568                                  					; set message flag
  7569                                  		;;pop	es
  7570                                  		;
  7571                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7572                                  dmax_ok:
  7573 000020D4 C3                      		retn
  7574                                  
  7575                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7576                                  
  7577                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7578                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7579                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7580                                  ;								 
  7581                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7582                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7583                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7584                                  
  7585                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7586 000020D5 56                      		push	si
  7587 000020D6 53                      		push	bx
  7588 000020D7 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7589                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7590 000020DB 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7591 000020DE 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7592                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7593 000020E0 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7594 000020E2 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7596                                  
  7597                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7598                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7599 000020E4 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7600                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7601 000020E6 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7602                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7603 000020E9 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7604                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7605 000020ED 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7606                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7607                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7608 000020F0 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7609 000020F3 8B36[0E16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7610 000020F7 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7611 000020F9 8306[0E16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7612 000020FE FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7613 00002102 8306[1016]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7614 00002107 5B                      		pop	bx
  7615 00002108 5E                      		pop	si
  7616 00002109 C3                      		retn
  7617                                  
  7618                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7619                                  
  7620                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7621                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7622                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7623                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7624                                  
  7625                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7626 0000210A 50                      		push	ax
  7627 0000210B 51                      		push	cx
  7628 0000210C 52                      		push	dx
  7629 0000210D 55                      		push	bp
  7630 0000210E 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7631                                  loop_clock:				
  7632 00002110 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7633 00002112 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7634 00002114 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7635 00002116 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7636                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7637                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7638                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7639 00002118 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7640 0000211B 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7641 0000211D 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7642 00002120 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7643 00002122 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7644 00002125 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7645 00002127 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7646 00002128 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7647                                  delay:					
  7648 0000212B E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7649 0000212D EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7650                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7651                                  
  7652                                  clock_present:				
  7653 0000212F 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7654 00002135 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7655                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7656                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7657 00002138 56                      		push	si
  7658 00002139 E8BAF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7659 0000213C FA                      		cli
  7660                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7661 0000213D 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7662 00002141 FB                      		sti
  7663 00002142 5E                      		pop	si
  7664                                  
  7665                                  no_readdate:				
  7666 00002143 5D                      		pop	bp
  7667 00002144 5A                      		pop	dx
  7668 00002145 59                      		pop	cx
  7669 00002146 58                      		pop	ax
  7670 00002147 C3                      		retn
  7671                                  
  7672                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7673                                  
  7674                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7675                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7676                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7677                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7678                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7679                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7680                                  ;
  7681                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7682                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7683                                  ;
  7684                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7685                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7686                                  ;
  7687                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7688                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7689                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7690                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7691                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7692                                  ;
  7693                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7694                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7695                                  
  7696                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7697                                  
  7698                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7699                                  
  7700                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7701                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7702                                  			
  7703 00002148 50                      		push	ax
  7704 00002149 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7705 0000214F 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7706 00002151 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7707                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7708 00002157 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7709 00002159 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7710                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7711 0000215F 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7712                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7713                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7714                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7715                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7716                                  cmosck4:				
  7717 00002161 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7718                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7719 00002163 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7720                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7721 00002165 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7722 00002168 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7723                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7724 0000216A E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7725 0000216D 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7726                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7727 0000216F 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7728 00002171 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7729                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7730 00002173 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7731                                  cmosck9:				
  7732 00002176 58                      		pop	ax
  7733 00002177 C3                      		retn
  7734                                  
  7735                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7736                                  
  7737                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7738                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7739                                  ;									       :
  7740                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7741                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7742                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7743                                  ;									       :
  7744                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7745                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7746                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7747                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7748                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7749                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7750                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7751                                  
  7752                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7753 00002178 9C                      		pushf
  7754 00002179 FA                      		cli
  7755 0000217A 53                      		push	bx
  7756 0000217B 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7757 0000217C 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7758 0000217E E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7759                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7760 00002180 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7761 00002181 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7762 00002183 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7763 00002185 58                      		pop	ax
  7764 00002186 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7765 00002188 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7766 0000218A E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7767                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7768 0000218C 90                      		nop
  7769 0000218D E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7770 0000218F 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7771 00002191 5B                      		pop	bx
  7772 00002192 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7773 00002193 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7774 00002196 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7775                                  
  7776                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7777                                  
  7778                                  cmos_popf:				
  7779 00002197 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7780                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7781                                  
  7782                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7783                                  
  7784                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7785                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7786                                  ;									       :
  7787                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7788                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7789                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7790                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7791                                  ;									       :
  7792                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7793                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7794                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7795                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7796                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7797                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7798                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7799                                  
  7800                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7801 00002198 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7802 00002199 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7803 0000219A FA                      		cli
  7804 0000219B 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7805 0000219C 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7806 0000219E E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7807                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7808 000021A0 90                      		nop
  7809 000021A1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7810 000021A3 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7811 000021A5 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7812 000021A6 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7813 000021A8 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7814 000021AA E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7815                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7816 000021AC 90                      		nop
  7817 000021AD E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7818 000021AF 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7819 000021B0 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7820 000021B1 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7821 000021B4 C3                      		retn
  7822                                  
  7823                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7824                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7826                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7827                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7828                                  
  7829                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7830                                  ;
  7831                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7832                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7833                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7834                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7835                                  
  7836                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7837                                  
  7838                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7839                                  ;
  7840                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7841                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7842                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7843                                  
  7844                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7845                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7846                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7847                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7848                                  
  7849                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7850                                  getclus:				
  7851 000021B5 51                      		push	cx
  7852 000021B6 57                      		push	di
  7853 000021B7 2E890E[8C15]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7854 000021BC 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7855 000021BE 48                      		dec	ax
  7856 000021BF 48                      		dec	ax
  7857 000021C0 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7858                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7859                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7860 000021C2 2E0306[8815]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7861 000021C7 2E1316[8A15]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7862                                  unpack:					
  7863 000021CC 1E                      		push	ds
  7864 000021CD 50                      		push	ax
  7865 000021CE 53                      		push	bx
  7866 000021CF 2E8B36[8F15]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7867 000021D4 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7868 000021D6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7869 000021D8 2EF606[8E15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7870                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7871 000021DE 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7872 000021E0 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7873                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7874 000021E2 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7875                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7876 000021E4 52                      		push	dx
  7877 000021E5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7878 000021E7 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7879 000021EA 5A                      		pop	dx
  7880 000021EB 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7881 000021ED 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7882                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7883                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7884 000021EF 2EA2[9615]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7885 000021F3 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7886 000021F4 52                      		push	dx
  7887 000021F5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7888 000021F7 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7889 000021FA 5A                      		pop	dx
  7890                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7891 000021FB A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7892 000021FE 2EA2[9715]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7893 00002202 2EA1[9615]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7894                                  even_odd:				
  7895 00002206 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7896 00002207 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7897 00002208 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7898 0000220A 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7899 0000220C D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7900                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7901 0000220E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7902 00002210 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7903 00002212 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7904                                  havclus:				
  7905 00002214 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7906 00002216 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7907 0000221A EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7908                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7909                                  
  7910                                  unpack16:				
  7911 0000221C 52                      		push	dx
  7912 0000221D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7913 0000221F D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7914 00002221 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7915 00002224 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7916 00002227 5A                      		pop	dx
  7917 00002228 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7918                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7919                                  unpackx:				
  7920 0000222A 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7921 0000222B 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7922 0000222C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7923 0000222D 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7924 0000222F 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7925 00002232 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7926 00002234 2E010E[8C15]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7927 00002239 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7928                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7929                                  
  7930                                  getcl2:					
  7931 0000223B 53                      		push	bx
  7932 0000223C 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7933 0000223D 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7934 0000223E 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7935 00002242 2E8B0E[8C15]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7936 00002247 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7937 00002248 2E8F06[2305]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7938                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7939 0000224D 1E                      		push	ds
  7940 0000224E 0E                      		push	cs
  7941 0000224F 1F                      		pop	ds
  7942 00002250 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7943                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7944 00002251 BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7945                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7946                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7947 00002254 E8CAF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7948 00002257 1F                      		pop	ds
  7949 00002258 5B                      		pop	bx
  7950 00002259 5F                      		pop	di
  7951 0000225A 2EA1[8C15]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7952 0000225E 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7953 00002260 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7954 00002262 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7955 00002264 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7956 00002265 C3                      		retn
  7957                                  
  7958                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7959                                  
  7960                                  
  7961                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7962                                  ;
  7963                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7964                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7965                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7966                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7967                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7968                                  ;
  7969                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7970                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7971                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7972                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7973                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7974                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7975                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7976                                  
  7977                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7978                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7979 00002266 50                      		push	ax
  7980 00002267 51                      		push	cx
  7981 00002268 57                      		push	di
  7982 00002269 56                      		push	si
  7983 0000226A 06                      		push	es
  7984 0000226B 1E                      		push	ds
  7985 0000226C 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7986 0000226E 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7987 00002273 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7988 00002275 90                      		nop
  7989                                  
  7990                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7991                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7992                                  
  7993 00002276 06                      		push	es
  7994 00002277 1E                      		push	ds
  7995 00002278 57                      		push	di
  7996 00002279 50                      		push	ax
  7997 0000227A 0E                      		push	cs
  7998 0000227B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7999                                  
  8000 0000227C 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8001 00002280 BD[7005]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8002                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8003                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8004 00002283 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8005 00002284 E89AF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8006 00002287 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8007 00002288 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8008                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8009 0000228C 5F                      		pop	di
  8010 0000228D 1F                      		pop	ds
  8011 0000228E 07                      		pop	es
  8012 0000228F 2E3B06[9815]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8013 00002294 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8014 00002296 2EA3[9815]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8015                                  					; sector number
  8016                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8017 0000229A 52                      		push	dx
  8018 0000229B 2EC706[2305]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8019                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8020                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8021 000022A2 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8022 000022A4 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8023 000022A7 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8024 000022AB 1E                      		push	ds
  8025 000022AC 07                      		pop	es
  8026 000022AD 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8027 000022AF 1E                      		push	ds
  8028 000022B0 0E                      		push	cs
  8029 000022B1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8030 000022B2 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8031 000022B3 BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8032                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8033                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8034 000022B6 E868F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8035 000022B9 1F                      		pop	ds
  8036 000022BA 5A                      		pop	dx
  8037 000022BB 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8038                                  
  8039                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8040 000022C0 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8041 000022C1 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8042                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8043                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8044 000022C3 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8045 000022C5 1F                      		pop	ds
  8046 000022C6 07                      		pop	es
  8047 000022C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8048 000022C8 5F                      		pop	di
  8049 000022C9 59                      		pop	cx
  8050 000022CA 58                      		pop	ax
  8051 000022CB C3                      		retn
  8052                                  
  8053                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8054                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8055

  8062                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)

  8065 000022CC 00<rep 4h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8066                                  %endif

  8069                                  
  8070                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8071                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8072                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8073                                  
  8074                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8075                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8076                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  8077                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8078                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  8079                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8080                                  
  8081                                  ;============================================================================
  8082                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8083                                  ;============================================================================
  8084                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8085                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8086                                  
  8087                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8088                                  
  8089                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8090                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8091                                  
  8092                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8093                                   
  8094                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8095                                  
  8096                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8098                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8099                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8100                                  
  8101                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8102 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8103 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8104                                  
  8105                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8106                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8107                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8108                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8109                                  
  8110                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8111                                  
  8112                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8113                                  
  8114                                  ;************************************************************************
  8115                                  ;*									*
  8116                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8117                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8118                                  ;*									*
  8119                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8120                                  ;*									*
  8121                                  ;************************************************************************
  8122                                  
  8123                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8124                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8125                                  
  8126                                  _seg_reinit:
  8127 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8128                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8129                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8130 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8131                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8132                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8133 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8134                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8135 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8136 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8137 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8138 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8139                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8140                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8141                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8142 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8143 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8144                                  
  8145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8146                                  
  8147                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8148                                  
  8149                                  ;************************************************************************
  8150                                  ;*									*
  8151                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8152                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8153                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8154                                  ;*									*
  8155                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8156                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8157                                  ;*									*
  8158                                  ;************************************************************************
  8159                                  
  8160                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8161 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8162 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8163 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8164 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8165 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8166 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8167 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8168 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8169 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8170 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8171 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8172                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8173                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8174 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8175 0000005A 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8176 0000005D A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8177 00000060 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8178 00000064 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8179 00000066 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8180 0000006A 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8181 0000006E 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8182 00000072 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8183 00000076 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8184                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8185 0000007A 81FE[3B05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8186                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8187                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8188 0000007E 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8189                                  
  8190                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8191                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8192                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8193                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8194                                  ;
  8195                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8196                                  ;
  8197                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8198                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8199                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8200                                  ;
  8201                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8202                                  
  8203                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8204 00000080 C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8205 00000086 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8206 00000089 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8207 0000008B 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8208                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8209                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8210 0000008F 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8211 00000093 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8212                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8213                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8214 00000097 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8215 00000098 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8216 0000009C 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8217 0000009F 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8218 000000A1 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8219 000000A2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8220 000000A4 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8221 000000A6 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8222 000000A7 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8223 000000AB FC                      		cld
  8224                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8225 000000AC 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8226                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8227 000000B0 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8228 000000B2 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8229                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8230                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8231                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8232                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8233 000000B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8234                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8235 000000B9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8236 000000BD 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8237                                  					; mark operation complete
  8238 000000C0 5B                      		pop	bx
  8239 000000C1 07                      		pop	es
  8240 000000C2 1F                      		pop	ds
  8241 000000C3 5D                      		pop	bp
  8242 000000C4 5F                      		pop	di
  8243 000000C5 5A                      		pop	dx
  8244 000000C6 59                      		pop	cx
  8245 000000C7 58                      		pop	ax
  8246 000000C8 5E                      		pop	si
  8247 000000C9 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8248                                  	
  8249                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8250                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8251                                  bc_retf:
  8252 000000CC CB                      		retf
  8253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8254                                  
  8255                                  command_error:				
  8256 000000CD E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8257 000000D0 EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8258                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8259                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8260                                  
  8261                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8262                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8263                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8264                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8265                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8266                                  ; high.
  8267                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8268                                  
  8269                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8270                                  
  8271                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8272                                  
  8273 000000D2 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8274                                  
  8275 000000D4 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8276                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8277                                  		
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8280                                  
  8281                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8282                                  
  8283                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8284 000000D9 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8285                                  					; unknown command error
  8286                                  
  8287                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8288                                  
  8289                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8290                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8291                                  
  8292                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8293                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8294                                  
  8295                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8296                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8297                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8298 000000DB C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8299 000000DF 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8300                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8301 000000E3 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8302 000000E5 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8303 000000E6 C3                      		retn
  8304                                  
  8305                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8306                                  
  8307                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8308
