  8310                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8312                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8313                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8314                                  
  8315                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8316                                  
  8317                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8318                                  
  8319                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8320                                  
  8321                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8322                                  
  8323                                  ;************************************************************************
  8324                                  ;*									*
  8325                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8326                                  ;*									*
  8327                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8328                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8329                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8330                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8331                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8332                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8333                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8334                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8335                                  ;*									*
  8336                                  ;************************************************************************
  8337                                  
  8338                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8339                                  		;db 0
  8340                                  
  8341                                  		; 13/12/202
  8342 000000E7 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8343                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8344 000000E8 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8345                                  					; 00 init
  8346 000000EA [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8347 000000EC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8348 000000EE [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8349                                  					; 03
  8350 000000F0 [5F01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8351                                  					; 04
  8352 000000F2 [A201]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8353                                  					; 05
  8354 000000F4 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8355 000000F6 [0B02]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8356                                  					; 07
  8357 000000F8 [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8358                                  					; 08
  8359 000000FA [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8360 000000FC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8361                                  con_table_end:
  8362 000000FE 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8363                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8364 000000FF [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8365 00000101 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8366 00000103 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8367 00000105 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8368 00000107 [1C02]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8369                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8370 00000109 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8371                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8372 0000010B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8373 0000010D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8374 0000010F [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8375 00000111 [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8376 00000113 [5202]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8377 00000115 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8378 00000117 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8379 00000119 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8380 0000011B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8381 0000011D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8382 0000011F [8C02]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8383 00000121 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8384 00000123 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8385 00000125 [BA02]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8386 00000127 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8387 00000129 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8388 0000012B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8389 0000012D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8390 0000012F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8391 00000131 [EF02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8392                                  prn_table_end:
  8393 00000133 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8394                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8395 00000134 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8396 00000136 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8397 00000138 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8398 0000013A [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8399 0000013C [0A03]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8400 0000013E [2F03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8401 00000140 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8402 00000142 [6503]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8403 00000144 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8404 00000146 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8405 00000148 [4F03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8406                                  aux_table_end:
  8407 0000014A 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8408                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8409 0000014B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8410 0000014D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8411 0000014F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8412 00000151 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8413 00000153 [D104]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8414 00000155 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8415 00000157 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8416 00000159 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8417 0000015B [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8418 0000015D [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8419                                  tim_table_end:
  8420                                  
  8421                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8422                                  
  8423                                  ;************************************************************************
  8424                                  ;*									*
  8425                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8426                                  ;*									*
  8427                                  ;************************************************************************
  8428                                  
  8429                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8430                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8431 0000015F E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8432                                  con_loop:				
  8433 00000161 E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8434 00000164 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8435 00000165 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8436                                  con_exit:				
  8437 00000167 F8                      		clc
  8438 00000168 C3                      		retn
  8439                                  
  8440                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8441                                  
  8442                                  ;************************************************************************
  8443                                  ;*									*
  8444                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8445                                  ;*									*
  8446                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8447                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8448                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8449                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8450                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8451                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8452                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8453                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8454                                  ;*									*
  8455                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8456                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8457                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8458                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8459                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8460                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8461                                  ;*									*
  8462                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8463                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8464                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8465                                  ;*									*
  8466                                  ;************************************************************************
  8467                                  
  8468                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8469                                  chrin:		
  8470 00000169 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8471 0000016D 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8472 0000016F 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8473 00000173 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8474 00000175 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8475 00000177 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8476 00000179 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8477 0000017B 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8478 0000017D 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8479 00000180 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8480 00000182 B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8481 00000184 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8482                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8483                                  
  8484                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8485                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8486                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8487                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8488                                  ;      else
  8489                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8490                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8491                                  ;      endif
  8492                                  ;    endif
  8493                                  ;  endif
  8494                                  
  8495                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8496 00000186 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8497 0000018B 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8498 0000018D 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8499 0000018F 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8500 00000191 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8501 00000193 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8502 00000195 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8503 00000197 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8505                                  
  8506                                  not_ext:				
  8507 00000199 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8508 0000019B 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8509                                  alt_save:				
  8510 0000019D 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8511                                  keyret:					
  8512 000001A1 C3                      		retn
  8513                                  
  8514                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8515                                  
  8516                                  ;************************************************************************
  8517                                  ;*									*
  8518                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8519                                  ;*									*
  8520                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8521                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8522                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8523                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8524                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8525                                  ;*									*
  8526                                  ;************************************************************************
  8527                                  
  8528                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8529                                  con_rdnd:				
  8530 000001A2 A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8531 000001A5 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8532 000001A7 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8533 000001A9 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8534 000001AD CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8535 000001AF 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8536 000001B1 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8537 000001B6 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8538 000001B8 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8539                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8540 000001BC 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8541                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8542 000001C1 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8543 000001C3 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8544 000001C6 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8545 000001C8 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8546                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8547                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8548                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8549                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8550 000001CA F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8551 000001CB B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8552 000001CD C3                      		retn
  8553                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8554                                  
  8555                                  gotchr:					
  8556 000001CE 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8557 000001D0 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8558 000001D2 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8559 000001D6 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8560 000001D8 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8561                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8562                                  
  8563                                  notbrk:					
  8564 000001DA 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8565 000001DD 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8566 000001DF B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8567 000001E1 EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8568                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8569                                  
  8570                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8571 000001E3 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8572 000001E8 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8573 000001EA 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8574 000001EC 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8575 000001EE 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8576 000001F1 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8577 000001F3 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8578                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8579                                  rdexit:					
  8580 000001F5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8581 000001F9 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8582                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8583                                  bc_exvec:				
  8584 000001FD F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8585                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8586 000001FE C3                      		retn
  8587                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8588                                  
  8589                                  ;************************************************************************
  8590                                  ;*									*
  8591                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8592                                  ;*									*
  8593                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8594                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8595                                  ;*									*
  8596                                  ;************************************************************************
  8597                                  
  8598                                  con_writ:
  8599                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8600 000001FF E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8601                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8602                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8603                                  con_lp:					
  8604 00000201 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8605 00000204 47                      		inc	di
  8606 00000205 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8607                                  					; AL = character to display
  8608 00000207 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8609                                  cc_ret:					
  8610 00000209 F8                      		clc
  8611 0000020A C3                      		retn
  8612                                  
  8613                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8614                                  
  8615                                  ;************************************************************************
  8616                                  ;*									*
  8617                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8618                                  ;*									*
  8619                                  ;************************************************************************
  8620                                  
  8621                                  con_flush:
  8622 0000020B C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8623                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8624 00000210 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8625 00000212 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8626                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8627                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8628                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8629 00000214 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8630 00000216 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8631 00000218 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8632                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8633 0000021A EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8634                                  
  8635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8636                                  
  8637                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8638                                  
  8639                                  ;************************************************************************
  8640                                  ;*									*
  8641                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8642                                  ;*									*
  8643                                  ;************************************************************************
  8644                                  
  8645                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8646                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8647                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8650                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8651                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8652                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8653                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8654                                  ;
  8655                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8656                                  
  8657                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8658                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8659                                  
  8660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8661                                  
  8662                                  ;************************************************************************
  8663                                  ;*									*
  8664                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8665                                  ;*									*
  8666                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8667                                  ;*									*
  8668                                  ;************************************************************************
  8669                                  
  8670                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8671 0000021C E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8672                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8673                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8674                                  prn_done:
  8675 0000021F F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8676 00000220 C3                      		retn
  8677                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8678                                  
  8679                                  ;************************************************************************
  8680                                  ;*									*
  8681                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8682                                  ;*									*
  8683                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8684                                  ;*									*
  8685                                  ;************************************************************************
  8686                                  
  8687                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8688                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8689 00000221 E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8690                                  prn_loop:				
  8691 00000223 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8692                                  prn_out:				
  8693 00000226 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8694 00000229 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8695 0000022B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8696 0000022E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8697 00000230 E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8698 00000233 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8699 00000235 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8700 00000238 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8701 0000023A B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8702 0000023C C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8703 00000241 EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8705                                  
  8706                                  _prnwf:					
  8707 00000243 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8708 00000246 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8709                                  TestPrnError:				
  8710 00000248 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8711 00000249 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8712                                  pmessg:					
  8713 0000024B E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8715                                  
  8716                                  prn_con:				
  8717 0000024E 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8718 0000024F E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8719                                  ;prn_done:				
  8720                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8721                                  prn_done2:
  8722                                  		;clc
  8723                                  		; cf=0
  8724 00000251 C3                      		retn
  8725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8726                                  
  8727                                  ;************************************************************************
  8728                                  ;*									*
  8729                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8730                                  ;*									*
  8731                                  ;************************************************************************
  8732                                  
  8733                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8734 00000252 E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8735 00000255 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8736 00000257 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8737                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8738                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8739 0000025A 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8740 0000025C E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8742                                  
  8743                                  ;************************************************************************
  8744                                  ;*									*
  8745                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8746                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8747                                  ;*									*
  8748                                  ;************************************************************************
  8749                                  
  8750                                  prnstat:				
  8751 0000025F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8752                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8753                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8754                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8755                                  
  8756                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8757                                  
  8758                                  ;************************************************************************
  8759                                  ;*									*
  8760                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8761                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8762                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8763                                  ;*									*
  8764                                  ;************************************************************************
  8765                                  
  8766                                  prnop:	
  8767 00000261 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8768 00000265 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8769                                  
  8770                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8771                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8772                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8773                                  
  8774 00000267 50                      		push	ax
  8775 00000268 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8776 0000026B 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8777 0000026E 58                      		pop	ax
  8778 0000026F 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8779 00000271 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8780 00000274 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8781                                  
  8782                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8783                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8784                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8785                                  
  8786                                  NextTest:				
  8787 00000277 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8788                                  					; i/o error?
  8789 0000027A 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8790                                  
  8791                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8792                                  
  8793 0000027C B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8794                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8795 0000027E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8796 00000281 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8797 00000283 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8798                                  ret1:					
  8799 00000285 C3                      		retn
  8800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8801                                  
  8802                                  checknotready:				
  8803 00000286 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8804 00000288 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8805 0000028B C3                      		retn
  8806                                  
  8807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8808                                  
  8809                                  ;************************************************************************
  8810                                  ;*									*
  8811                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8812                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8813                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8814                                  ;*									*
  8815                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8816                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8817                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8818                                  ;*									*
  8819                                  ;************************************************************************
  8820                                  
  8821                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8822                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8823 0000028C 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8824                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8825 0000028E 51                      		push	cx
  8826 0000028F 53                      		push	bx
  8827 00000290 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8828 00000292 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8829 00000296 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8830                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8831 00000298 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8832 0000029C 5B                      		pop	bx
  8833                                  prn_getstat:				
  8834 0000029D E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8835 000002A0 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8836 000002A2 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8837 000002A5 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8838 000002A7 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8839 000002A8 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8840 000002AA 26                      		es
  8841 000002AB AC                      		lodsb
  8842                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8843                                  					; lodsb
  8844 000002AC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8845 000002AE E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8846 000002B1 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8847 000002B3 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8848                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8849                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8850                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8851 000002B5 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8852                                  
  8853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8854                                  
  8855                                  prn_bperr:				
  8856 000002B6 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8857                                  prn_berr:				
  8858 000002B7 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8859                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8860                                  
  8861                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8862                                  
  8863                                  ;************************************************************************
  8864                                  ;*									*
  8865                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8866                                  ;*									*
  8867                                  ;************************************************************************
  8868                                  
  8869                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8870                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8871                                  
  8872                                  ;********************************;*
  8873                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8874                                  ;********************************;*
  8875                                  
  8876                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8877                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8878                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8879                                  
  8880                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8881                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8882                                  ;;endstruc
  8883                                  
  8884                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8885                                  
  8886                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8887                                  
  8888                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8889                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8890 000002BA C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8891 000002BE 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8892                                  					; ioc_pc
  8893 000002C3 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8894                                  
  8895                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8896 000002C5 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8898                                  
  8899                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8900 000002C8 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8901 000002CC 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8902 000002D0 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8903                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8904 000002D2 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8905 000002D6 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8906                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8907 000002D8 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8908 000002DC 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8909 000002DE 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8910 000002E0 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8911 000002E2 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8912 000002E4 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8913                                  prngetcount:				
  8914                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8915 000002E7 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8916 000002EB 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8917                                  					; return current retry count
  8918                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8919                                  		; cf=0
  8920                                  		;clc
  8921 000002EE C3                      		retn
  8922                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8923                                  
  8924                                  ;************************************************************************
  8925                                  ;*									*
  8926                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8927                                  ;*									*
  8928                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*

  8930                                  
  8931                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8932 000002EF C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8933 000002F3 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8934                                  					; ioc_pc
  8935 000002F8 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8936 000002FA 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8937 000002FE 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8938 00000300 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8939 00000302 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8940 00000304 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8941                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8942                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8943                                  		; cf=0		
  8944                                  		;clc
  8945 00000306 C3                      		retn
  8946                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8947                                  
  8948                                  prn_query_err:
  8949                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8950                                  		;stc
  8951 00000307 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8952                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8953                                  
  8954                                  ;************************************************************************
  8955                                  ;*									*
  8956                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8957                                  ;*									*
  8958                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8959                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8960                                  ;*									*
  8961                                  ;************************************************************************
  8962                                  
  8963                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8964                                  
  8965                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8966                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8967                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8968                                  
  8969                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8970                                  
  8971                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8972                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8973                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8974                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8975                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8976                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8977                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8978                                  
  8979                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8980                                  
  8981                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8982                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8983                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8984                                  
  8985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8986                                  
  8987                                  ;************************************************************************
  8988                                  ;*									*
  8989                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8990                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8991                                  ;*									*
  8992                                  ;************************************************************************
  8993                                  
  8994                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8995                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8996 0000030A E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8997 0000030C E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8998 0000030F 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8999 00000311 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9000 00000313 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9001 00000315 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9002                                  aux1:					
  9003 00000317 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9004                                  					; won't return if error
  9005                                  aux2:					
  9006 0000031A AA                      		stosb
  9007 0000031B E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9008                                  exvec2:					
  9009 0000031D F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9010                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9011 0000031E C3                      		retn
  9012                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9013                                  
  9014                                  ;************************************************************************
  9015                                  ;*									*
  9016                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9017                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9018                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9019                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9020                                  ;*									*
  9021                                  ;************************************************************************
  9022                                  
  9023                                  auxin:					
  9024 0000031F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9025 00000321 E83A00                  		call	auxop
  9026 00000324 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9027                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9028                                  		;retn
  9029                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9030 00000327 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9031                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9032                                  
  9033                                  arbad:					
  9034 00000329 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9035                                  		;xor	al, al
  9036                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9037                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9038 0000032A B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9039 0000032C E9ACFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9040                                  
  9041                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9042                                  
  9043                                  ;************************************************************************
  9044                                  ;*									*
  9045                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9046                                  ;*									*
  9047                                  ;************************************************************************
  9048                                  
  9049                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9050 0000032F E85200                  		call	getbx
  9051 00000332 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9052 00000334 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9053 00000336 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9054 00000338 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9055 0000033B F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9056 0000033E 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9057 00000340 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9058 00000342 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9059 00000344 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9060 00000347 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9061                                  auxdrx:					
  9062 00000349 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9063                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9064                                  
  9065                                  auxbus:					
  9066 0000034C E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9067                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9068                                  
  9069                                  ;************************************************************************
  9070                                  ;*									*
  9071                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  9072                                  ;*									*
  9073                                  ;************************************************************************
  9074                                  
  9075                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  9077 00000352 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9078 00000354 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9079 00000356 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9080 00000359 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9081                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9082                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9083                                  		;clc
  9084 0000035B C3                      		retn
  9085                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9086                                  
  9087                                  ;************************************************************************
  9088                                  ;*									*
  9089                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9090                                  ;*									*
  9091                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9092                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9093                                  ;*									*
  9094                                  ;************************************************************************
  9095                                  
  9096                                  auxstat:				
  9097 0000035C B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9098                                  
  9099                                  		; fall into auxop
  9100                                  
  9101                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9102                                  
  9103                                  ;************************************************************************
  9104                                  ;*									*
  9105                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9106                                  ;*									*
  9107                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9108                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9109                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9110                                  ;*									*
  9111                                  ;************************************************************************
  9112                                  
  9113                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9114 0000035E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9115                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9116                                  					; get port number
  9117 00000362 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9118                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9119                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9120 00000364 C3                      		retn
  9121                                  
  9122                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9123                                  
  9124                                  ;************************************************************************
  9125                                  ;*									*
  9126                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9127                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9128                                  ;*									*
  9129                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9130                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9131                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9132                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9133                                  ;*									*
  9134                                  ;************************************************************************
  9135                                  
  9136                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9137 00000365 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9138 00000368 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9139                                  					; zero out buffer
  9140                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9141                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9142                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9143 0000036B C3                      		retn
  9144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9145                                  
  9146                                  ;************************************************************************
  9147                                  ;*									*
  9148                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9149                                  ;*									*
  9150                                  ;************************************************************************
  9151                                  
  9152                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9153                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9154 0000036C E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9155                                  aux_loop:				
  9156 0000036E 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9157                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9158 00000371 47                      		inc	di
  9159 00000372 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9160 00000374 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9161 00000377 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9162 0000037A 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9163 0000037C B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9164 0000037E E95AFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9166                                  
  9167                                  awok:					
  9168 00000381 E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9169                                  					; still	more character to print
  9170                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9171                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9172                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9173 00000383 C3                      		retn
  9174                                  
  9175                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9176                                  
  9177                                  ;************************************************************************
  9178                                  ;*									*
  9179                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9180                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9181                                  ;*									*
  9182                                  ;************************************************************************
  9183                                  
  9184                                  getbx:	
  9185 00000384 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  9186                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9187                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9188 00000388 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9189                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9190                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  9191 0000038C C3                      		retn
  9192                                  
  9193                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9194                                  
  9195                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9196                                  
  9197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9198                                  ;								:
  9199                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9200                                  ;								:
  9201                                  ;								:
  9202                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9203                                  ;								:
  9204                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9205                                  ;								:
  9206                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9207                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9208                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9209                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9210                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9211                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9212                                  ;								:
  9213                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9214                                  ;								:
  9215                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9216                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9217                                  ;								:
  9218                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9219                                  
  9220                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9221                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9222                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9223                                  
  9224                                  ;19/07/2019
  9225                                  ;09/03/2019
  9226                                  
  9227                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9228                                  
  9229                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9230                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9231                                  
  9232 0000038D B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9233 0000038F F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9234 00000391 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9235 00000393 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9236 00000395 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9237 00000398 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9238 0000039A F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9239 0000039C 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9240 0000039E B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9241 000003A0 F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9242 000003A2 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9243 000003A4 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9244 000003A7 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9245 000003A9 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9246 000003AB 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9247                                  
  9248                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9249                                  
  9250 000003AE 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9251 000003AF 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9252 000003B0 BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9253 000003B3 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9254 000003B5 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9255 000003B7 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9256 000003B8 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9257 000003BA 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9258 000003BC 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9259 000003BF 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9260 000003C0 BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9261 000003C3 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9262 000003C5 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9263 000003C7 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9264 000003C9 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9265 000003CB 98                      		cbw
  9266 000003CC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9267 000003CD F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9268 000003CF 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9269 000003D1 CB                      		retf			; far return
  9270                                  
  9271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9272                                  
  9273                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9274                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9275                                  
  9276                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9277                                  ;
  9278                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9279                                  ;
  9280                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9281                                  ;
  9282                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9283                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9284                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9285                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9286                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9287                                  ;
  9288                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9289                                  ;
  9290                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9291                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9292                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9293                                  ;
  9294                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9295                                  
  9296                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9297                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
  9298                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9299 000003D2 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9300 000003D5 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9301                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9302 000003D6 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9303                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9304 000003DB 7423                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9305 000003DD 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9306                                  					; get binary hours
  9307                                  					; convert to bcd
  9308                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9309                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9310                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9311 000003E1 E8E800                  		call	bintobcd
  9312 000003E4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9313 000003E6 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9314                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9315                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9316 000003EA E8DF00                  		call	bintobcd
  9317 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9318 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9319                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9320                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd
  9321 000003F3 E8D600                  		call	bintobcd
  9322                                  
  9323 000003F6 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9324 000003F8 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9325 000003FA FA                      		cli
  9326 000003FB B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9327 000003FD CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9328                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9329                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9330                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9331 000003FF FB                      		sti
  9332                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9333 00000400 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9334 00000404 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9335                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9336 00000408 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9337                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9338                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9339                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9340 0000040C FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9341 0000040D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9342 0000040F CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9343                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9344                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9345                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9346 00000411 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9347 00000415 FB                      		sti
  9348                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9349 00000416 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9350 0000041B 7409                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9351                                  
  9352                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9353                                  		;call	far [daycnttoday]
  9354                                  		;;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9355                                  					; convert to bcd format
  9356 0000041D E80700                  		call	daycnttoday
  9357                                  
  9358 00000420 FA                      		cli
  9359 00000421 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9360 00000423 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9361                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9362                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9363                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9364 00000425 FB                      		sti
  9365                                  no_cmos_2:
  9366                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9367                                  		; cf=0
  9368                                  		;clc
  9369 00000426 C3                      		retn
  9370

  9380                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
  9381                                  
  9382                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  9383                                  ;
  9384                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  9385                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  9386                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  9387                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  9388                                  
  9389                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
  9390                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
  9391 00000427 FF36[F004]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
  9392 0000042B 813E[F004]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9393                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  9394 00000431 7308                    		jnb	short century20
  9395                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
  9396                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
  9397                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9398 00000433 C706[F404]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
  9399 00000439 EB0C                    		jmp	short years
  9400                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9401                                  		
  9402                                  century20:				
  9403                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 20
  9404                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 0
  9405                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9406 0000043B C706[F404]1400          		mov	word [base_century], 20
  9407 00000441 812E[F004]891C          		sub	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9408                                  					; adjust daycnt
  9409                                  years:					
  9410 00000447 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9411 00000449 A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9412 0000044C BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  9413                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  9414 0000044F F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  9415 00000451 8916[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  9416 00000455 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  9417 00000457 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  9418 00000459 0006[F504]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  9419 0000045D FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  9420                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9421 00000461 BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
  9422 00000464 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
  9423                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
  9424 00000467 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
  9425 0000046B 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  9426 0000046D FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  9427                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  9428 00000471 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
  9429                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  9430                                  regularyear:	
  9431                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9432 00000475 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365			
  9433                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
  9434 00000476 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9435 0000047A 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  9436 0000047C FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
  9437                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
  9438 00000480 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023 
  9439 00000484 E2EF                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  9440                                  					;
  9441                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9442                                  leapyear:	
  9443 00000486 C606[F704]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
  9444                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  9445                                  					; change month table.
  9446                                  yeardone:
