 11594 00000C80 59                      		pop	cx
 11595 00000C81 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11596 00000C82 C3                      		retn
 11597                                  
 11598                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11599                                  
 11600                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11601                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11602                                  
 11603                                  set_tim:		
 11604 00000C83 50                      		push	ax
 11605 00000C84 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11606                                  
 11607                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11608                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11609                                  
 11610 00000C87 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11611 00000C8B 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11612 00000C8D 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11613                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11614                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11615 00000C91 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11616                                  setaccess:				
 11617 00000C93 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11618 00000C98 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11619 00000C9C 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11620                                  done_set:				
 11621 00000CA0 F8                      		clc
 11622                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11623 00000CA1 58                      		pop	ax
 11624 00000CA2 C3                      		retn
 11625                                  
 11626                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11627                                  
 11628                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11629                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11630                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11631                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11632                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11633                                  
 11634                                  again:	
 11635 00000CA3 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11636 00000CA6 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11637 00000CA9 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11638                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11639 00000CAB 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11640 00000CAC C3                      		retn
 11641                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11642                                  
 11643                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11644 00000CAD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11645 00000CAF C3                      		retn

 11751                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11752                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11753                                  ;
 11754                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11755                                  ;
 11756                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11757                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11758                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11759                                  ;
 11760                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11761                                  
 11762                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11763                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11764                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11765 00000CE0 E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11766 00000CE3 06                      		push	es
 11767 00000CE4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11768 00000CE8 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11769                                  					; RAWIO
 11770 00000CED 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11771 00000CF1 07                      		pop	es
 11772 00000CF2 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11773                                  
 11774                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11775                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11776                                  
 11777                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11778 00000CF4 BE[B10C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11779                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11780                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11781 00000CF7 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11782 00000CF9 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11783                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11784 00000CFB BE[C40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11785                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11786                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11787                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11788 00000CFE 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11789 00000D00 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11790 00000D02 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11791 00000D05 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11792 00000D07 98                      		cbw
 11793 00000D08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11794 00000D0A 46                      		inc	si
 11795 00000D0B 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11796 00000D0D 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11797                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11798 00000D10 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11799                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11800                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11801 00000D15 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11802 00000D17 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11803                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11804                                  
 11805                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11806                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11807                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h

 11816                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11817                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11818                                  ;
 11819                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11820                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11821                                  ;
 11822                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11823                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11824                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11825                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11826                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11827                                  
 11828                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11829                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11830                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11831                                  
 11832 00000D1C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11833 00000D20 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11834                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11835 00000D23 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11836 00000D27 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11837 00000D2A 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11838 00000D2E 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11839                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11840 00000D31 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11841 00000D34 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11842 00000D38 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11843 00000D3B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11844 00000D3D 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11845                                  					
 11846                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11847 00000D40 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11848 00000D43 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11849                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11850 00000D46 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11851 00000D48 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11852 00000D49 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11853                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11854                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11855                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11856 00000D4E E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11857 00000D51 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11858 00000D54 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11859 00000D55 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11860 00000D57 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11861                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11862                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11863 00000D5A 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11864                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11865 00000D5D B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11866                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11867 00000D60 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11868 00000D61 06                      		push	es
 11869 00000D62 1F                      		pop	ds
 11870 00000D63 07                      		pop	es
 11871 00000D64 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11872                                  		
 11873                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11874                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11875                                  		;clc
 11876                                  GetParmRet:				
 11877 00000D66 C3                      		retn

 12049                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12050                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12051                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12052                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12053                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12054                                  ;
 12055                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12056                                  ;
 12057                                  ; output:
 12058                                  ;	for status call:
 12059                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12060                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12061                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12062                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12063                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12064                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12065                                  ;
 12066                                  ;	for format track:
 12067                                  ;		carry set if error
 12068                                  ;
 12069                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12070                                  
 12071                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12072                                  
 12073                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12222                                  
 12223                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12224                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12225                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12226                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12227                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12228                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12229                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12230                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12231                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12232                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12233                                  		; register.
 12234                                  
 12235                                  					; Special function requested?

 12242 00000F2F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12243 00000F31 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 12244 00000F33 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 12245                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12246 00000F35 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 12247                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12248                                  					; fnon_removable

 12251                                  		; 10/12/2022

 12254                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12255                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12256 00000F41 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack

 12336                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12337                                  
 12338                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12339                                  
 12340                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12341                                  ;
 12342                                  ; TrackIo:
 12343                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12344                                  ;
 12345                                  ;   input:
 12346                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12347                                  ;		  3 = write
 12348                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12349                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12350                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12351                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12352                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12353                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12354                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12355                                  ;
 12356                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12357                                  
 12358                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12359                                  		
 12360                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12361                                  TrackIo:	
 12362                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12363 00000F92 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12364 00000F96 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12365 00000F99 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12366                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12367 00000F9E 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12368 00000FA0 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12369 00000FA1 51                      		push	cx
 12370 00000FA2 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12371 00000FA5 59                      		pop	cx
 12372 00000FA6 58                      		pop	ax
 12373                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12374 00000FA7 BE[3305]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12375 00000FAA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12376 00000FAC D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12377 00000FAE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12378                                  
 12379                                  		; WE WANT:
 12380                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12381                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12382                                  		
 12383 00000FB0 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12384                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12385 00000FB3 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12386                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12387                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12388 00000FB8 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12389                                  		
 12390 00000FBA 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12391                                  ionextsector:				
 12392 00000FBC 51                      		push	cx
 12393 00000FBD 52                      		push	dx
 12394 00000FBE 46                      		inc	si
 12395 00000FBF 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12396                                  					; the track table
 12397 00000FC0 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12398 00000FC1 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12399                                  
 12400                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12401                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12402                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12403                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12404                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12405                                  		
 12406                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12407 00000FC4 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12408                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12409                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12410 00000FC9 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12411                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12412 00000FCB F606[2705]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12413                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12414                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12415 00000FD0 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12416 00000FD2 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12417 00000FD6 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12418 00000FD8 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12419 00000FDB 5A                      		pop	dx
 12420 00000FDC 59                      		pop	cx
 12421 00000FDD F8                      		clc
 12422 00000FDE C3                      		retn
 12423                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12424                                  
 12425                                  IoRemovable:				
 12426 00000FDF AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12427                                  					; table	and save it
 12428 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 12429 00000FE1 56                      		push	si
 12430 00000FE2 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12431 00000FE3 50                      		push	ax
 12432 00000FE4 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 12433                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12434 00000FE8 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12435 00000FEC 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12436 00000FEF 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12437 00000FF2 58                      		pop	ax
 12438 00000FF3 1F                      		pop	ds
 12439 00000FF4 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12440 00000FF6 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12441 00000FF9 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk
 12442 00000FFC 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 12443                                  					; sector size
 12444 00000FFD 58                      		pop	ax
 12445                                  
 12446                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 12447                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 12448 00000FFE 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12449 00001000 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12450 00001003 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12451                                  
 12452 00001005 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12453 00001007 5A                      		pop	dx
 12454 00001008 59                      		pop	cx
 12455 00001009 E2B1                    		loop	ionextsector
 12456 0000100B 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12457                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12458                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12459 00001010 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12460 00001012 E867FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12461                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12462                                  NoNeedDone:
 12463 00001015 F8                      		clc
 12464                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12465 00001016 C3                      		retn

 12470                                  ;
 12471                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12472                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12473                                  ; are permissible.
 12474                                  ;

 12476                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12477                                  ; All other registers preserved

 12510                                  ; SetDASD

 12520                                  SetDasd:
 12521 00001017 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12522                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12523 0000101C 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12524                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12525 0000101E 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12527                                  					; set_dasd_true

 12532                                  					; ~set_dasd_true

 12543 0000103F 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12544                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12545                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12546                                  		;jz	short GotBig

 12548                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12549                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12558 00001047 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12559 0000104C 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12560                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12561                                  		; 10/12/2022

 12563                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12574                                  
 12575 0000105A C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]

 12577                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12578

 12585 0000106A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12586                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12587                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12588 0000106C 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12589 00001070 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 12592                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12593                                  
 12594                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12595                                  
 12596                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12597                                  ;
 12598                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12599                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12600                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12601                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12602                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12603                                  ;
 12604                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12605                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12606                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12607                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12608                                  ;
 12609                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12610                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12611                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12612                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12613                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12614                                  ;
 12615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12616                                  
 12617                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12618                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12619 00001075 51                      		push	cx
 12620 00001076 52                      		push	dx
 12621                                  
 12622                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12623                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12624                                  
 12625 00001077 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12626 0000107C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12627 0000107E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12628 00001080 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12629 00001085 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12630 00001087 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12631                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12632                                  
 12633                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12634 00001089 06                      		push	es
 12635 0000108A 56                      		push	si
 12636                                  
 12637                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12638                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12639 0000108B 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12640 0000108D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12641                                  
 12642 0000108F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12643                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12644                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12645 00001094 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12646 00001098 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12647                                  
 12648                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12649                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12650                                  
 12651 0000109C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12652 000010A1 5E                      		pop	si
 12653 000010A2 07                      		pop	es
 12654                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12655 000010A3 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12656 000010A7 49                      		dec	cx
 12657 000010A8 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12658 000010AB D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12659 000010AD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12660 000010AF 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12661 000010B1 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12662 000010B5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12663 000010B9 06                      		push	es
 12664 000010BA 1E                      		push	ds
 12665 000010BB 56                      		push	si
 12666 000010BC 57                      		push	di
 12667 000010BD B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12668 000010BF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12669                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12670 000010C1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12671 000010C3 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12672 000010C8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12673 000010CA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12674                                  
 12675                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12676                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12677 000010CB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12678 000010CD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12679 000010CF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12680                                  
 12681 000010D0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12682                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12683                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12684 000010D5 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12685 000010D9 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12686                                  
 12687                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12688                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12689                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12690                                  		;mov	es, si
 12691 000010DD 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12692                                  
 12693                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12694 000010DE 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12695                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12696 000010E3 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12697 000010E8 C606[3006]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12698                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12699 000010ED 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12700                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12701 000010EF A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12702 000010F2 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet

 12711 000010F9 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb

 12751                                  
 12752                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12753                                  
 12754                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12755                                  ;
 12756                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12757                                  ;
 12758                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12759                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12760                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12761                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12762                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12763                                  ;
 12764                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12765                                  
 12766                                  ResetDisk:
 12767 00001109 50                      		push	ax
 12768                                  
 12769                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12770 0000110A B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12771 0000110D 3806[3006]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12772                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12773                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12774 00001111 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12775                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12776                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12777 00001113 A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12778                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12779                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12780                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12781 00001116 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12782                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12783 00001118 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12784                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12785 0000111D 58                      		pop	ax
 12786 0000111E C3                      		retn

 12788                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12789                                  
 12790                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12791                                  
 12792                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12793                                  ;
 12794                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12795                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12796                                  ;
 12797                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12798                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12799                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12800                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12801                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12802                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12803                                  ;
 12804                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12805                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12806                                  ;
 12807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12808                                  
 12809                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12810                                  ToRom:	
 12811 0000111F 53                      		push	bx
 12812 00001120 56                      		push	si
 12813                                  
 12814                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12815                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12816                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12817

 12866                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12867                                  ;
 12868                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12869                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12870                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12871                                  ;
 12872                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12873                                  
 12874                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12875                                  ioctl_getown:
 12876 00001177 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12877 0000117A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12878                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12879 0000117E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12880                                  ownloop:				
 12881 00001182 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12882 00001186 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12883                                  		; 10/12/2022

 12886                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12887 0000118D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12888                                  getnextBDS:

 12890 00001192 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12892                                  
 12893                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12894                                  ;
 12895                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12896                                  ; in al to al.

 12991                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12992                                  ;	get media id
 12993                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12994                                  ;
 12995                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12996                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12997                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12998                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12999                                  ;
 13000                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13001                                  ;
 13002                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13003                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13004                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13005                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13006                                  ;
 13007                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13008                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13009                                  ;
 13010                                  ; LOGIC:
 13011                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13012                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13013                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13014                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13015                                  ;
 13016                                  ; {
 13017                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13018                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13019                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13020                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13021                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13022                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13023                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13024                                  ;		};
 13025                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13026                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13027                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13028                                  ;		};
 13029                                  ;	else
 13030                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13031                                  ;
 13032                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13033                                  
 13034                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13035                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13036                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13037                                  
 13038                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13039                                  GetMediaId:
 13040 000011E8 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13041 000011EB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13042 000011EF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13043 000011F4 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13044 000011F7 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13045                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13046 000011F9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13047                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13048 000011FE 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13049                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13050 00001200 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13051 00001203 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13052                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13053                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13054 00001206 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13055 00001208 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13056 0000120C 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13057                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13058 00001210 46                      		inc	si
 13059                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13060                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13061 00001211 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13062 00001214 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13063                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13064                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13065 00001217 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13066                                  	
 13067                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13068                                  		; cf = 0
 13069                                  		;clc
 13070                                  
 13071 00001219 C3                      		retn
 13072                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13073                                  
 13074                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 13075 0000121A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13076 0000121C F9                      		stc
 13077                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 13078 0000121D C3                      		retn
 13079                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13080                                  
 13081                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13082                                  
 13083                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13084                                  ;  set media id
 13085                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13086                                  
 13087                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13088                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13089                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13090                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13091                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13092                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13093                                  ;
 13094                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13095                                  ;
 13096                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13097                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13098                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13099                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13100                                  ;
 13101                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13102                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13103                                  ;
 13104                                  ; logic:
 13105                                  ;
 13106                                  ; {
 13107                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13108                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13109                                  ;	BootIo;
 13110                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13111                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13112                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13113                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13114                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13115                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13116                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13117                                  ;		};
 13118                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13119                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13120                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13121                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13122                                  ;		};
 13123                                  ;	else
 13124                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13125                                  ;
 13126                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13127                                  
 13128                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13129                                  SetMediaId:
 13130 0000121E E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13131 00001221 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13132                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13133 00001225 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13134 00001227 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13135 0000122C 52                      		push	dx
 13136 0000122D E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13137 00001230 5A                      		pop	dx
 13138 00001231 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13139                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13140 00001233 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13141                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13142 00001238 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13143 0000123A 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13144                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13145 0000123F 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13146 00001241 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13147 00001242 57                      		push	di
 13148 00001243 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13149 00001244 07                      		pop	es
 13150 00001245 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13151 00001248 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13152 0000124C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13153 0000124F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13154 00001252 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13155                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13156                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13157 00001255 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13158 00001257 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13159 00001258 1F                      		pop	ds
 13160 00001259 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13161 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 13162 0000125B E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13163 0000125E 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13164 00001260 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13165 00001265 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13166 00001268 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13167                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13168                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13169 0000126D C3                      		retn
 13170                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13171                                  
 13172                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13173 0000126E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13174 00001270 F9                      		stc
 13175                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13176 00001271 C3                      		retn

 13178                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13179                                  
 13180                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13181                                  
 13182                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13183                                  ;	BootIo
 13184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13185                                  ;
 13186                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13187                                  ;
 13188                                  ; input :
 13189                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13190                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13191                                  ;
 13192                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13193                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13194                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13195                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13196                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13197                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13198                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13199                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13200                                  ;
 13201                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13202                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13203                                  ;
 13204                                  ; logic:
 13205                                  ;
 13206                                  ; {
 13207                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13208                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13209                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13210                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13211                                  ; }
 13212                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13213                                  
 13214                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13215                                  BootIo:	
 13216 00001272 06                      		push	es
 13217 00001273 57                      		push	di
 13218 00001274 53                      		push	bx
 13219 00001275 1E                      		push	ds
 13220 00001276 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13221                                  
 13222                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13223                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13224                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13225                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13226                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13227                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13228                                  
 13229 00001277 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13230 0000127A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13231 0000127C 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13232 00001280 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13233 00001283 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13234 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 13235 00001287 5F                      		pop	di
 13236 00001288 07                      		pop	es
 13237 00001289 C3                      		retn
 13238                                  
 13239                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13240                                  
 13241                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13242                                  
 13243                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13244                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13245                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13246                                  ;
 13247                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13248                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13249                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13250                                  ; history in the flags.
 13251                                  ;
 13252                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13253                                  ;
 13254                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13255                                  ;
 13256                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13257                                  ;
 13258                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13259                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13260                                  ;
 13261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13262                                  
 13263                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13264 0000128A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13265 0000128E 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13266 00001290 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13267                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13268 00001292 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13269                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13270                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13271 00001297 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13272 00001299 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13273 0000129E 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13274 000012A0 E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13275 000012A3 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13276                                  
 13277                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13278                                  
 13279 000012A5 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13280 000012A7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13281                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13282                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13283 000012A9 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13284 000012AB 53                      		push	bx
 13285 000012AC BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13286                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13287                                  					; physical drive
 13288 000012AF E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13289 000012B2 5B                      		pop	bx
 13290                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13291 000012B3 C3                      		retn
 13292

 13296                                  
 13297                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13298                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13299                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13300                                  ;
 13301                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13302                                  ;
 13303                                  ; INPUT :
 13304                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13305                                  ;
 13306                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13307                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13308                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13309                                  
 13310                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13311                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13312 000012B4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13313 000012B8 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13314                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13315                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13316 000012BB 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13317                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13318 000012BD 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13319                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13320                                  					; unformatted_media
 13321 000012C2 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13322 000012C4 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13323                                  
 13324                                  GafDone:				
 13325 000012C6 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13326 000012C9 C3                      		retn
 13327                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13328                                  
 13329                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13330                                  
 13331                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13332                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13333                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13334                                  ;
 13335                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13336                                  ;
 13337                                  ; input :
 13338                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13339                                  ;
 13340                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13341                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13342                                  
 13343                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13344                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13345 000012CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13346 000012CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13347                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13348 000012D1 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13349                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13350                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13351 000012D6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13352 000012DA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13353                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13354 000012DC 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13355                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13356                                  					; unformatted_media
 13357                                  saf_Done:				
 13358 000012E1 C3                      		retn
 13359                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13360                                  
 13361                                  ; 16/10/2022
