 14228 00001591 7221                    		jb	short goterr13	; error	on original orig13 call-thru?
 14229                                  ret_from_i13:				
 14230 00001593 1F                      		pop	ds
 14231 00001594 CA0200                  		retf	2		; restore ds &	iret w/flags
 14232                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14233                                  
 14234                                  ; most of our code exits through here. If carry isn't set, then
 14235                                  ; just do a simple exit. Else doublecheck that we aren't getting
 14236                                  ; a changeline error.
 14237                                  
 14238                                  i13ret_ck_chglinerr:			
 14239 00001597 73FA                    		jnb	short ret_from_i13 ; done if not an error termination
 14240                                  i13_ret_error:				
 14241 00001599 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6		; did i	see a change event?
 14242 0000159C 7513                    		jnz	short int13b	; skip if wrong	error
 14243 0000159E 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; is this for the hard disk?
 14244 000015A0 780F                    		js	short int13b	; yes, ignore
 14245 000015A2 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 14246 000015A7 7408                    		jz	short int13b	; just in case ROM returned this
 14247                                  					; error	even though it told us it
 14248                                  					; never	would
 14249 000015A9 53                      		push	bx
 14250 000015AA BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 14251 000015AD E8B703                  		call	set_changed_dl
 14252 000015B0 5B                      		pop	bx
 14253                                  int13b:					
 14254 000015B1 F9                      		stc			; now return the error
 14255 000015B2 EBDF                    		jmp	short ret_from_i13
 14256                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14257                                  
 14258                                  ; some kind of error occurred. see if it is dma violation
 14259                                  
 14260                                  goterr13:				
 14261 000015B4 80FC09                  		cmp	ah, 9		; dma error?
 14262 000015B7 747C                    		jz	short gotdmaerr
 14263                                  goterr13_xxxx:				
 14264 000015B9 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; ecc error?
 14265 000015BC 75DB                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error ; other error. just	return back.
 14266 000015BE 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1 ; formatting?
 14267 000015C3 74D4                    		jz	short i13_ret_error
 14268                                  
 14269 000015C5 803E[1F00]02            		cmp	byte [prevoper+1], 2
 14270                                  		;cmp	byte ptr ds:prevoper+1,	2 ; ecc-corrected error
 14271                                  					; (2 = romread)
 14272                                  					; ECC correction only applies to reads
 14273 000015CA 75CD                    		jnz	short i13_ret_error
 14274                                  
 14275 000015CC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 14276                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15ABh
 14277                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14278 000015CE 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14279                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14280                                  					; call far 70:797h
 14281 000015D3 A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]
 14282 000015D6 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; return code =	no error
 14283 000015D8 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		; if request for one sector, assume ok
 14284 000015DA 74B7                    		jz	short ret_from_i13 ; return with carry clear
 14285 000015DC 53                      		push	bx
 14286 000015DD 51                      		push	cx
 14287 000015DE 52                      		push	dx
 14288 000015DF A2[2000]                		mov	[number_of_sec], al
 14289                                  loop_ecc:				
 14290 000015E2 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 14291                                  
 14292                                  ; we do reads one sector at a time. this ensures that we will eventually
 14293                                  ; finish the request since ecc errors on one sector do read in that sector.
 14294                                  ;
 14295                                  ; we need to put in some "intelligence" into the ecc handler to handle reads
 14296                                  ; that attempt to read more sectors than are available on a particular
 14297                                  ; track.
 14298                                  ;
 14299                                  ; we call check_wrap to set up the sector #, head # and cylinder # for
 14300                                  ; this request.
 14301                                  ;
 14302                                  ; at this point, all registers are set up for the call to orig13, except
 14303                                  ; that there may be a starting sector number that is bigger than the number
 14304                                  ; of sectors on a track.
 14305                                  ;
 14306 000015E5 E88FFE                  		call	check_wrap	; get correct parameters for int 13
 14307                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15C5h
 14308                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14309 000015E8 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14310                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14311 000015ED 730C                    		jnb	short ok11_op
 14312 000015EF 80FC09                  		cmp	ah, 9		; DMA error during ECC read?
 14313 000015F2 741B                    		jz	short handle_dma_during_ecc
 14314 000015F4 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; only allow ecc errors
 14315 000015F7 7510                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err
 14316                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14317                                  		; xor ax ax -> ah = 0
 14318                                  		;mov	ah, 0		; ecc error. reset the system again.
 14319 000015F9 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; clear	the error code so that if this
 14320                                  					; was the last sector, no error	code
 14321                                  					; will be returned for the corrected
 14322                                  					; read.	(clear carry too.)
 14323                                  ok11_op:				
 14324 000015FB FE0E[2000]              		dec	byte [number_of_sec]
 14325 000015FF 7409                    		jz	short ok11_exit	; all done?
 14326 00001601 FEC1                    		inc	cl		; advance sector number
 14327                                  					; add 200h to address
 14328 00001603 FEC7                    		inc	bh
 14329 00001605 FEC7                    		inc	bh
 14330 00001607 EBD9                    		jmp	short loop_ecc
 14331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14332                                  
 14333                                  ; locate error returns centrally
 14334                                  
 14335                                  ok11_exit_err:				
 14336 00001609 F9                      		stc			; set carry bit again.
 14337                                  ok11_exit:				
 14338 0000160A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14339 0000160B 59                      		pop	cx
 14340 0000160C 5B                      		pop	bx
 14341 0000160D EB88                    		jmp	short i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 14342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14343                                  
 14344                                  ; do the single sector read again, this time into our temporary
 14345                                  ; buffer, which is guaranteed not to have a DMA error, then
 14346                                  ; move the data to its proper location and proceed
 14347                                  
 14348                                  handle_dma_during_ecc:			
 14349 0000160F 06                      		push	es
 14350 00001610 53                      		push	bx
 14351 00001611 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14352 00001614 1E                      		push	ds
 14353 00001615 07                      		pop	es		; point es:bx to buffer
 14354 00001616 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h	; read one sector
 14355                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:15F8h
 14356                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14357 00001619 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14358                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14359 0000161E 5B                      		pop	bx
 14360 0000161F 07                      		pop	es
 14361 00001620 7305                    		jnb	short handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr
 14362 00001622 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h
 14363 00001625 75E2                    		jnz	short ok11_exit_err ; if anything but ecc error, bomb out
 14364                                  
 14365                                  ; now we're kosher. Copy the data to where it belongs and resume
 14366                                  ; the ECC looping code.
 14367                                  
 14368                                  handle_dma_during_ecc_noerr:		
 14369 00001627 56                      		push	si
 14370 00001628 57                      		push	di
 14371 00001629 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 14372 0000162B BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 14373 0000162E E82BFE                  		call	move_sector
 14374 00001631 5F                      		pop	di
 14375 00001632 5E                      		pop	si
 14376 00001633 EBC6                    		jmp	short ok11_op
 14377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14378                                  
 14379                                  ; we truly have a dma violation. restore register ax and retry the
 14380                                  ; operation as best we can.
 14381                                  
 14382                                  gotdmaerr:				
 14383 00001635 A1[1E00]                		mov	ax, [prevoper]	; 19/10/2022
 14384 00001638 FB                      		sti
 14385 00001639 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 14386 0000163C 723B                    		jb	short i13_done_dmaerr
 14387                                  					; just pass dma error thru for
 14388                                  					; functions we don't handle
 14389 0000163E 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 14390 00001641 743C                    		jz	short intverify
 14391 00001643 80FC05                  		cmp	ah, 5		; romformat
 14392 00001646 7448                    		jz	short intformat
 14393 00001648 772F                    		ja	short i13_done_dmaerr
 14394                                  
 14395                                  ; we are doing a read/write call. check for dma problems
 14396                                  
 14397                                  ;	******** set up stack frame here!!! ********
 14398                                  
 14399 0000164A 52                      		push	dx
 14400 0000164B 51                      		push	cx
 14401 0000164C 53                      		push	bx
 14402 0000164D 50                      		push	ax
 14403 0000164E 55                      		push	bp
 14404 0000164F 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 14405 00001651 8CC2                    		mov	dx, es		; check	for 64k	boundary error
 14406 00001653 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14407 00001655 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14408 00001657 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 14409 00001659 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1		; segment converted to absolute	address
 14410 0000165B 01DA                    		add	dx, bx		; combine with offset
 14411 0000165D 81C2FF01                		add	dx, 511		; simulate a transfer
 14412                                  
 14413                                  ; if carry is set, then we are within 512 bytes of the end of the segment.
 14414                                  ; we skip the first transfer and perform the remaining buffering and transfer
 14415                                  
 14416 00001661 7303                    		jnb	short no_skip_first
 14417 00001663 E98300                  		jmp	bufferx		; restore dh=head & do buffer
 14418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14419                                  
 14420                                  no_skip_first:				
 14421 00001666 D0EE                    		shr	dh, 1		; dh = number of sectors before	address
 14422 00001668 B480                    		mov	ah, 128		; ah = max number of sectors in	segment
 14423 0000166A 28F4                    		sub	ah, dh
 14424                                  
 14425                                  ; ah is now the number of sectors that we can successfully write in this
 14426                                  ; segment. if this number is above or equal to the requested number, then we
 14427                                  ; continue the operation as normal. otherwise, we break it into pieces.
 14428                                  ;
 14429                                  ; wait a sec. this is goofy. the whole reason we got here in the
 14430                                  ; first place is because we got a dma error. so it's impossible
 14431                                  ; for the whole block to fit, unless the dma error was returned
 14432                                  ; in error.
 14433                                  
 14434 0000166C 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; can we fit it	in?
 14435 0000166E 7236                    		jb	short doblock	; no, perform blocking.
 14436                                  
 14437                                  ; yes, the request fits. let it happen.
 14438                                  
 14439 00001670 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 14440                                  					; set up head number
 14441 00001673 E888FE                  		call	doint
 14442 00001676 E9D900                  		jmp	bad13		; and return from this place
 14443                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14444                                  
 14445                                  i13_done_dmaerr:			
 14446 00001679 B409                    		mov	ah, 9		; pass dma error thru to caller
 14447 0000167B F9                      		stc
 14448 0000167C E914FF                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; return with error,
 14449                                  					; we know it's not a changeline error
 14450                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14451                                  
 14452                                  ; verify the given sectors. place the buffer pointer into our space.
 14453                                  
 14454                                  intverify:				
 14455 0000167F 06                      		push	es		; save caller's dma address
 14456 00001680 53                      		push	bx
 14457 00001681 1E                      		push	ds		; es:bx	-> Bios_Data:disksector
 14458 00001682 07                      		pop	es
 14459                                  dosimple:				
 14460 00001683 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14461                                  					; do the i/o from Bios_Data:disksector
 14462                                  		;;call	far 70:797h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:1665h
 14463                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14464 00001686 9A[7207]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:call_orig13
 14465                                  		;call	call_orig13	; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:call_orig13
 14466 0000168B 5B                      		pop	bx
 14467 0000168C 07                      		pop	es
 14468 0000168D E907FF                  		jmp	i13ret_ck_chglinerr
 14469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14470                                  
 14471                                  ; format operation. copy the parameter table into Bios_Data:disksector
 14472                                  
 14473                                  intformat:				
 14474 00001690 06                      		push	es
 14475 00001691 53                      		push	bx
 14476 00001692 56                      		push	si
 14477 00001693 57                      		push	di
 14478 00001694 1E                      		push	ds
 14479                                  
 14480                                  ; point ds to the caller's dma buffer, es to Bios_Data
 14481                                  ; in other words, swap (ds, es)
 14482                                  
 14483 00001695 06                      		push	es
 14484 00001696 1E                      		push	ds
 14485 00001697 07                      		pop	es
 14486 00001698 1F                      		pop	ds
 14487 00001699 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
 14488 0000169B BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector
 14489 0000169E E8BBFD                  		call	move_sector	; user's data into Bios_Data:disksector
 14490 000016A1 1F                      		pop	ds
 14491 000016A2 5F                      		pop	di
 14492 000016A3 5E                      		pop	si		; do the i/o from
 14493 000016A4 EBDD                    		jmp	short dosimple	; Bios_Data:disksector
 14494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14495                                  
 14496                                  ; we can't fit the request into the entire block. perform the operation on
 14497                                  ; the first block.
 14498                                  ;
 14499                                  ; doblock is modified to correctly handle multi-sector disk i/o.
 14500                                  ; old doblock had added the number of sectors i/oed (ah in old doblock) after
 14501                                  ; the doint call to cl. observing only the lower 6 bits of cl(=max. 64) can
 14502                                  ; represent a starting sector, if ah was big, then cl would be clobbered.
 14503                                  ; by the way, we still are going to use cl for this purpose since checkwrap
 14504                                  ; routine will use it as an input. to prevent cl from being clobbered, a
 14505                                  ; safe number of sectors should be calculated like "63 - # of sectors/track".
 14506                                  ; doblock will handle the first block of requested sectors within the
 14507                                  ; boundary of this safe value.
 14508                                  
 14509                                  doblock:
 14510                                  
 14511                                  ; try to get the # of sectors/track from bds via rom drive number.
 14512                                  ; for any mini disks installed, here we have to pray that they have the
 14513                                  ; same # of sector/track as the main dos partition disk drive.
 14514                                  				
 14515 000016A6 8B5608                  		mov	dx, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14516                                  					; get head #, drive #
 14517 000016A9 51                      		push	cx
 14518 000016AA 06                      		push	es
 14519 000016AB 57                      		push	di		; ah - # of sectors before dma boundary
 14520                                  					; al - requested # of sectors for i/o.
 14521 000016AC E83BFE                  		call	find_bds
 14522 000016AF 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14523                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14524 000016B3 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 14525                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags],fnon_removable
 14526 000016B8 5F                      		pop	di
 14527 000016B9 07                      		pop	es
 14528 000016BA 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; set al=ah for	floppies
 14529 000016BC 7404                    		jz	short doblockflop ; they are track by track operation
 14530 000016BE B43F                    		mov	ah, 63		; ah = 63-secpt	(# safe	sectors??)
 14531 000016C0 28CC                    		sub	ah, cl		; al - # of sectors before dma boundary
 14532                                  doblockflop:				
 14533 000016C2 59                      		pop	cx
 14534                                  doblockcontinue:			
 14535 000016C3 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; if safe_# >= #_of_sectors_to_go_before dma,
 14536 000016C5 7305                    		jnb	short doblocklast ; then #_of_sectors_to_go as it is for doint.
 14537 000016C7 50                      		push	ax
 14538 000016C8 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; otherwise, set al to ah to operate.
 14539 000016CA EB03                    		jmp	short doblockdoint
 14540                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14541                                  
 14542                                  doblocklast:				
 14543 000016CC 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 14544 000016CE 50                      		push	ax
 14545                                  doblockdoint:				; let ah = al =	# of sectors for this shot	
 14546 000016CF E82CFE                  		call	doint
 14547 000016D2 727E                    		jb	short bad13	; something happened, bye!
 14548 000016D4 58                      		pop	ax
 14549 000016D5 286602                  		sub	[bp+2],	ah	; sub [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax], ah
 14550                                  					; decrement by the successful operation
 14551 000016D8 00E1                    		add	cl, ah		; advance sector #. safety gauranteed.
 14552 000016DA 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; advance dma addres
 14553 000016DC 00E7                    		add	bh, ah		; twice	for 512	byte sectors
 14554 000016DE 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; check	the previous value
 14555 000016E0 740A                    		jz	short buffer	; if #_of_sectors_to_go	< safe_#,
 14556                                  					; then we are done already.
 14557 000016E2 28E0                    		sub	al, ah		; otherwise,
 14558                                  					; #_sector_to_go = #_of_sector_to_go - safe_#
 14559 000016E4 E890FD                  		call	check_wrap	; get new cx, dh for the next operation.
 14560 000016E7 EBDA                    		jmp	short doblockcontinue ;	handles	next sectors left.
 14561                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14562                                  
 14563                                  bufferx:				
 14564 000016E9 8A7609                  		mov	dh, [bp+9]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx+1]
 14565                                  					; set up head number
 14566                                  buffer:					
 14567 000016EC 53                      		push	bx
 14568 000016ED 8A6603                  		mov	ah, [bp+3]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax+1]
 14569 000016F0 80FC03                  		cmp	ah, 3		; romwrite
 14570 000016F3 7525                    		jnz	short doread	;
 14571                                  					
 14572                                  ; copy the offending sector into local buffer
 14573                                  
 14574 000016F5 06                      		push	es
 14575 000016F6 1E                      		push	ds
 14576 000016F7 56                      		push	si
 14577 000016F8 57                      		push	di
 14578 000016F9 1E                      		push	ds		; exchange segment registers
 14579 000016FA 06                      		push	es
 14580 000016FB 1F                      		pop	ds
 14581 000016FC 07                      		pop	es
 14582 000016FD BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; where to move
 14583 00001700 57                      		push	di		; save it
 14584 00001701 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; source
 14585 00001703 E856FD                  		call	move_sector	; move sector into local buffer
 14586 00001706 5B                      		pop	bx		; new transfer address
 14587                                  					; (es:bx = Bios_Data:diskbuffer)
 14588 00001707 5F                      		pop	di		; restore caller's di & si
 14589 00001708 5E                      		pop	si
 14590 00001709 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore Bios_Data
 14591                                  
 14592                                  ; see if we are wrapping around a track or head
 14593                                  
 14594 0000170A B001                    		mov	al, 1		; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14595                                  					; get drive number
 14596 0000170C 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]
 14597 0000170F E865FD                  		call	check_wrap	; sets up registers if wrap-around
 14598                                  					;
 14599                                  					; ah is	function
 14600                                  					; al is	1 for single sector transfer
 14601                                  					; es:bx	is local transfer addres
 14602                                  					; cx is	track/sector number
 14603                                  					; dx is	head/drive number
 14604                                  					; si,di	unchanged
 14605 00001712 E8E9FD                  		call	doint
 14606 00001715 07                      		pop	es		; restore caller's dma segment
 14607 00001716 723A                    		jb	short bad13	; go clean up
 14608 00001718 EB22                    		jmp	short dotail
 14609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14610                                  
 14611                                  ; reading a sector. do int first, then move things around
 14612                                  
 14613                                  doread:					
 14614 0000171A 06                      		push	es
 14615 0000171B 53                      		push	bx
 14616 0000171C 1E                      		push	ds		; es = Bios_Code
 14617 0000171D 07                      		pop	es
 14618 0000171E BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
 14619 00001721 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 14620 00001723 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14621                                  					; get drive number
 14622 00001726 E84EFD                  		call	check_wrap	;
 14623                                  					; ah = function
 14624                                  					; al = 1 for single sector
 14625                                  					; es:bx	points to local	buffer
 14626                                  					; cx, dx are track/sector, head/drive
 14627 00001729 E8D2FD                  		call	doint
 14628 0000172C 5B                      		pop	bx
 14629 0000172D 07                      		pop	es
 14630 0000172E 7222                    		jb	short bad13
 14631 00001730 56                      		push	si
 14632 00001731 57                      		push	di
 14633 00001732 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
 14634 00001734 BE[4E01]                		mov	si, disksector
 14635 00001737 E822FD                  		call	move_sector
 14636 0000173A 5F                      		pop	di
 14637 0000173B 5E                      		pop	si
 14638                                  
 14639                                  ; note the fact that we've done 1 more sector
 14640                                  
 14641                                  dotail:					
 14642 0000173C 5B                      		pop	bx		; retrieve new dma area
 14643 0000173D 80C702                  		add	bh, 2		; advance over sector
 14644 00001740 41                      		inc	cx
 14645 00001741 8A4602                  		mov	al, [bp+2]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.oldax]
 14646 00001744 F8                      		clc
 14647 00001745 FEC8                    		dec	al
 14648 00001747 7409                    		jz	short bad13	; no more i/o
 14649                                  
 14650                                  ; see if we wrap around a track or head boundary with starting sector
 14651                                  ; we already have the correct head number to pass to check_wrap
 14652                                  
 14653 00001749 8A5608                  		mov	dl, [bp+8]	; [bp+INT13FRAME.olddx]
 14654 0000174C E828FD                  		call	check_wrap
 14655 0000174F E8ACFD                  		call	doint
 14656                                  
 14657                                  ; we are done. ax has the final code; we throw away what we got before
 14658                                  
 14659                                  ; M046  -- okay gang. Now we've either terminated our DMA loop,
 14660                                  ;	   or we've finished. If carry is set now, our only
 14661                                  ;	   hope for salvation is that it was a read operation
 14662                                  ;	   and the error code is ECC error. In that case, we'll
 14663                                  ;	   just pop the registers and go do the old ECC thing.
 14664                                  ;	   When the DMA error that got us here in the first
 14665                                  ;	   place occurs, it'll handle it.
 14666                                  
 14667                                  bad13:					
 14668 00001752 89EC                    		mov	sp, bp
 14669 00001754 5D                      		pop	bp
 14670 00001755 5B                      		pop	bx
 14671 00001756 5B                      		pop	bx
 14672 00001757 59                      		pop	cx
 14673 00001758 5A                      		pop	dx
 14674 00001759 7203                    		jb	short xgoterr13_xxxx ; go handle ECC errors
 14675 0000175B E935FE                  		jmp	ret_from_i13	; non-error exit
 14676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14677                                  
 14678                                  xgoterr13_xxxx:				
 14679 0000175E E958FE                  		jmp	goterr13_xxxx
 14680                                  
 14681                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14682                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14683                                  		;db 	0
 14684                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14685                                  
 14686                                  ;Bios_Code ends

 14696                                  dsk_init:				; 2C7h:1742h = 70h:3CB2h
 14697 00001761 8A26[7500]              		mov	ah, [drvmax]

 14703                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14704                                  
 14705                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14706                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14707                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14708                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14709                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14710                                  
 14711                                  install_bds:
 14712 0000176D 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14713 0000176E BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14714                                  
 14715                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14716                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14717                                  loop_next_bds:
 14718 00001771 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14719                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14720 00001773 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14721 00001777 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14722                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14723 0000177A 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14724 0000177C B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14725 0000177E 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14726                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14727 00001782 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14728 00001785 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14729                                  					; we don't own it
 14730 0000178A 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14731                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14732 0000178D 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14733 00001790 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14734                                  next_bds:
 14735                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14736 00001794 B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14737 00001797 3904                    		cmp	[si], ax	; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14738                                  		;cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14739                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14740 00001799 75D6                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14741 0000179B 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14742                                  					; install bds
 14743 0000179E 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14744 000017A0 268905                  		mov	[es:di], ax	; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14745                                  		;mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14746                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14747 000017A3 1F                      		pop	ds
 14748                                  
 14749                                  ; 01/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:1785h)

 14753                                  ;      'eot' variable appropriately.

 14762                                  _eot_ok:
