 14850                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14851                                  
 14852                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14853                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14854                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14855                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14856                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14857                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14858                                  
 14859                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14860 000017F4 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14861 000017F6 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14861 000017FF 736B6574746520666F-
 14861 00001808 7220647269766520   
 14862                                  
 14863                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14864 00001810 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14864 00001819 65737320616E79206B-
 14864 00001822 6579207768656E2072-
 14864 0000182B 656164790D0A       
 14865 00001831 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14866                                  
 14867                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14868                                  
 14869                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14870                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14871                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14872                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14873                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14874                                  
 14875                                  chkopcnt:		
 14876 00001833 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14877 00001838 C3                      		retn
 14878                                  
 14879                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14880                                  
 14881                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14882                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14883                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14884                                  ;
 14885                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14886                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14887                                  
 14888                                  mediacheck:	
 14889 00001839 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14890 0000183C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14891 0000183E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14892 00001841 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14893 00001843 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14894 00001846 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14895 00001848 50                      		push	ax
 14896 00001849 52                      		push	dx
 14897 0000184A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14898                                  					; set logical drive number
 14899 0000184E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14900 00001850 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14901                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14902                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14903 00001852 5A                      		pop	dx
 14904 00001853 58                      		pop	ax
 14905 00001854 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14906 00001856 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14907                                  
 14908                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14909                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14910                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14911                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14912                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14913                                  ; status.
 14914                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14915 00001859 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14916 0000185D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14917                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14918                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14919                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14920                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14921 00001861 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14922                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14923                                  
 14924                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14925                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14926                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14927                                  
 14928 00001863 50                      		push	ax
 14929 00001864 51                      		push	cx
 14930 00001865 52                      		push	dx
 14931 00001866 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14932 00001869 5A                      		pop	dx
 14933 0000186A 59                      		pop	cx
 14934 0000186B 58                      		pop	ax
 14935 0000186C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14936 0000186E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14937                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14938 00001870 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14939                                  mediaret:				
 14940 00001872 C3                      		retn
 14941                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14942                                  
 14943                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14944                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14945                                  ; or write.
 14946                                  
 14947                                  mediadovolid:				
 14948 00001873 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14949 00001876 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14950 00001878 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14951 0000187B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14952 0000187D E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14953                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14954                                  
 14955                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14956                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14957                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14958                                  ; dos.
 14959                                  ;
 14960                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14961                                  
 14962                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14963                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14964                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14965                                  
 14966                                  checklatchio:	
 14967                                  
 14968                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14969                                  			
 14970 00001880 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14971 00001883 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14972                                  
 14973                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14974                                  
 14975 00001885 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14976 00001888 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14977                                  
 14978                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14979                                  ; expensive verification.
 14980                                  
 14981 0000188A E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14982 0000188D 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14983 0000188F E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14984 00001892 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14985 00001894 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14986 00001896 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14987 00001898 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14988                                  checklatchret:				
 14989 0000189B E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14990                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14991 0000189E F9                      		stc
 14992 0000189F 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14993                                  checkret:				
 14994 000018A0 C3                      		retn
 14995                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14996                                  
 14997                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14998                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14999                                  ;
 15000                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15001                                  
 15002                                  checkfatvid:				
 15003 000018A1 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15004 000018A4 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15005 000018A6 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15006                                  
 15007                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15008                                  
 15009                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15010                                  
 15011                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15012                                  
 15013                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15014                                  ;
 15015                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15016                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15017                                  ;
 15018                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15019                                  ;
 15020                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15021                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15022                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15023                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15024                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15025                                  ;
 15026                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15027                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15028                                  ; routine.)
 15029                                  ;
 15030                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15031                                  
 15032                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15033                                  check_vid:
 15034                                  
 15035                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15036                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15037                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15038                                  
 15039 000018A8 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15040                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15041                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15042 000018AD 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15043 000018AF E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15044 000018B2 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15045 000018B4 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15046 000018B6 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15047                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15048 000018BB 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15049                                  					; if not fat system
 15050 000018BD E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15051 000018C0 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15052 000018C2 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15053 000018C5 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15054                                  					; definitely changed
 15055 000018C8 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15056                                  
 15057 000018CA 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15058                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15059 000018CB E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15060                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15061                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15062                                  		;clc
 15063                                  checkfatret:				
 15064 000018CE C3                      		retn
 15065                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15066                                  
 15067                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15068                                  changed_drv:
 15069 000018CF F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15070 000018D0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15071                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15072 000018D5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15074                                  
 15075                                  ; extended id check
 15076                                  
 15077                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15078                                  
 15079                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15080                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15081                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15082                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15083                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15084                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15085                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15086                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15087                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15088                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15089                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15090                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15091                                  ;
 15092                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15093                                  
 15094                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15095                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15096 000018D6 50                      		push	ax
 15097                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15098                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15099 000018D7 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15100                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15101 000018DA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15102 000018DC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15103 000018E0 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15104 000018E2 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15105 000018E5 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15106 000018E9 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15107                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15108                                  					; don't know
 15109 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15110 000018EC EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15111                                  					; reset the flag
 15112                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15113                                  
 15114                                  ext_changed:
 15115 000018EE 58                      		pop	ax
 15116                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15117 000018EF 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15118                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15119                                  					; disk changed!
 15120                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15121                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15122                                  		;clc
 15123 000018F0 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15124                                  
 15125                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15126                                  
 15127                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15128                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15129                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15130                                  ;
 15131                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15132                                  
 15133                                  checkio:				
 15134 000018F2 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15135 000018F5 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15136 000018F7 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15137 000018FA 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15138 000018FC E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15139 000018FF 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15140 00001901 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15141 00001904 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15142 00001906 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15143 00001908 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15144 0000190A 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15145 0000190B C3                      		retn
 15146                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15147                                  
 15148                                  checkioerr:				
 15149 0000190C E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15150                                  
 15151                                  checkioret:				
 15152 0000190F F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15153 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15154                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15155                                  
 15156                                  no_error_map:				
 15157 00001913 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15158                                  
 15159                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15160                                  
 15161                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15162                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15163                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15164                                  
 15165                                  returnvid:		
 15166 00001916 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15167                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15168 00001919 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15169 0000191C B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15170 0000191E F9                      		stc
 15171 0000191F C3                      		retn
 15172                                  
 15173                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15174                                  
 15175                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15176                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15177                                  ;
 15178                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15179                                  ; **trashes si**
 15180                                  
 15181                                  media_set_vid:				
 15182 00001920 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15183                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15184                                  
 15185                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15186                                  
 15187                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15188                                  
 15189                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15190                                  
 15191                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15192                                  vid_into_packet:
 15193 00001923 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15194 00001924 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15195 00001928 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15196 0000192B 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15197 0000192D 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15198 00001930 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15199 00001933 1F                      		pop	ds
 15200                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15201 00001934 C3                      		retn
 15202                                  
 15203                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15204                                  
 15205                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15206                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15207                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15208                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15209                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15210                                  ;
 15211                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15212                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15213                                  ;
 15214                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15215                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15216                                  ;		carry set
 15217                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15218                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15219                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15220                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15221                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15222                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15223                                  ;
 15224                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15225                                  
 15226                                  hidensity:
 15227                                  
 15228                                  ; check for correct drive
 15229                                  		
 15230                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15231 00001935 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15232                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15233                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15234 0000193A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15235                                  
 15236                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15237                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15238                                  
 15239 0000193C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15240 00001941 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15241                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15242                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15243 00001943 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15244 00001946 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15245                                  
 15246                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15247                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15248                                  
 15249                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15250 00001948 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15251 0000194C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15252                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15253                                  					; ffOther
 15254 0000194E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15255 00001950 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15256                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15257                                  					; ff288
 15258 00001952 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15259 00001954 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15260 00001956 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15261                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15262                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15263 00001959 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15264                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15265                                  					; 2 sides
 15266                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15267 0000195C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15268 0000195D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15269                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15270                                  					; & head max
 15271                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15272 00001960 E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15274                                  
 15275                                  Is720K:
 15276                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15277 00001963 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15278                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15279 00001964 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15280                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15281                                  
 15282                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15283                                  ;dofloppy:
 15284                                  		;retn
 15285                                  
 15286                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15287                                  
 15288                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15289                                  
 15290                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15291                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15292                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15293                                  ;
 15294                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15295                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15296                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15297                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15298                                  ;
 15299                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15300                                  ;
 15301                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15302                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15303                                  
 15304                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15305 00001967 06                      		push	es
 15306 00001968 57                      		push	di
 15307                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15308                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15309 00001969 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15310                                  
 15311                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15312                                  
 15313                                  scan_bds:				
 15314 0000196D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15315 00001971 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15316                                  
 15317                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15318                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15319                                  
 15320 00001973 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15321                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15322                                  get_next_bds:				
 15323 00001977 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15324                                  					; go to	next bds
 15325 0000197A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15326 0000197D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15327 0000197F 5F                      		pop	di
 15328 00001980 07                      		pop	es
 15329 00001981 C3                      		retn
 15330                                  
 15331                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15332                                  
 15333                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15334                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15335                                  ;
 15336                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15337                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15338                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15339                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15340                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15341                                  
 15342                                  checkromchange:	
 15343                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15344                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15345 00001982 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15346                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15347                                  					; fchanged
 15348 00001987 C3                      		retn
 15349                                  
 15350                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15351                                  
 15352                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15353                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15354                                  ;
 15355                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15356                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15357                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15358                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15359                                  
 15360                                  resetchanged:	
 15361                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15362                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15363 00001988 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15364                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15365                                  					; ~fchanged
 15366 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15367                                  
 15368                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15369                                  
 15370                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15371                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15372                                  ;
 15373                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15374                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15375                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15376                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15377                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15378                                  
 15379                                  haschange:
 15380                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15381                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15382 0000198E 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15383                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15384                                  					; fchangeline
 15385 00001993 C3                      		retn
 15386                                  
 15387                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15388                                  
 15389                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15390                                  
 15391                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15392                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15393                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15394                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15395                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15396                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15397                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15398                                  
 15399                                  ; set_volume_id
 15400                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15401                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15402                                  ;
 15403                                  ;   on entry:
 15404                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15405                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15406                                  ;
 15407                                  ;   on exit:
 15408                                  ;	carry clear:
 15409                                  ;	   successful call
 15410                                  ;	carry set
 15411                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15412                                  
 15413                                  set_volume_id:				
 15414 00001994 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15415 00001995 50                      		push	ax
 15416 00001996 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15417 00001999 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15418 0000199B E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15419 0000199E 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15420 000019A0 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15421 000019A3 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15422                                  setvret:				
 15423                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15424                                  		; cf = 0
 15425                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15426 000019A6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15427 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 15428 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15430                                  
 15431                                  seterr:					
 15432 000019A9 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15433 000019AA 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15434 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15435                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15436 000019AC 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15437                                  
 15438                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15439                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15440                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15441                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15442                                  
 15443                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15444                                  
 15445                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15446                                  
 15447                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15448                                  ;
 15449                                  ;   on entry:
 15450                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15451                                  ;
 15452                                  ;   on exit:
 15453                                  ;	carry clear
 15454                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15455                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15456                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15457                                  ;
 15458                                  ;	carry set:
 15459                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15460                                  
 15461                                  read_volume_id:
 15462 000019AE 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15463 000019AF 51                      		push	cx
 15464 000019B0 53                      		push	bx
 15465 000019B1 50                      		push	ax
 15466 000019B2 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15467 000019B3 57                      		push	di
 15468 000019B4 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15469 000019B5 07                      		pop	es
 15470 000019B6 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15471 000019B9 BE[9F08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15472                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15473 000019BC B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15474 000019BF F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15475 000019C1 5F                      		pop	di
 15476 000019C2 07                      		pop	es
 15477 000019C3 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15478                                  					; # of fats
 15479 000019C7 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15480                                  					; sectors / fat
 15481 000019CB F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15482 000019CD 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15483                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15484                                  					;
 15485                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15486                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15487 000019D1 2EA3[AC19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15488                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15489                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15490 000019D5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15491                                  					; # root dir entries
 15492 000019D9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15493 000019DB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15494                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15495                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15496 000019DD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15497                                  next_sec:
 15498 000019DE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15499 000019DF 2EA1[AC19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15500                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15501                                  					; get sector #
 15502 000019E3 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15503                                  					; sectors / track
 15504 000019E7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15505 000019E9 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15506                                  
 15507                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15508                                  
 15509 000019EB 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15510                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15511 000019EC 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15512 000019EE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15513 000019F0 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15514                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15515 000019F4 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15516 000019F6 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15517 000019F8 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15518                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15519 000019FB 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15520 000019FD B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15521 00001A00 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15522                                  fvid_loop:
 15523                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15524 00001A02 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15525                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15526 00001A04 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15527 00001A06 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15528 00001A09 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15529 00001A0B 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15530 00001A0E 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15531                                  ent_loop:
 15532 00001A10 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15533 00001A13 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15534 00001A15 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15535 00001A16 2EFF06[AC19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15536                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15537                                  					; next sector
 15538 00001A1B E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15539                                  notfound:
 15540                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15541                                  		;xor	si, si
 15542 00001A1D EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15543                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15544                                  
 15545                                  found_vid:
 15546                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15547                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15548 00001A1F 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15549 00001A20 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15550 00001A22 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15551 00001A23 57                      		push	di
 15552 00001A24 1E                      		push	ds
 15553 00001A25 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15554 00001A26 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15555 00001A29 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15556                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15557 00001A2C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15558                                  		;xor	al, al
 15559                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15560 00001A2E 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15561 00001A2F AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15562                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15563                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15564                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15565 00001A30 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15566 00001A31 07                      		pop	es
 15567                                  fvid_ret:
 15568                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15569 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15570                                  				
 15571 00001A34 58                      		pop	ax
 15572                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15573                                  		; cf = 0
 15574                                  		;clc
 15575                                  rvidret:
 15576 00001A35 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15577 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx
 15578 00001A37 5A                      		pop	dx
 15579 00001A38 C3                      		retn
 15580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15581                                  
 15582                                  no_vid:
 15583 00001A39 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15584                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15585                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15586 00001A3A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15587                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15588                                  
 15589                                  readviderr:
 15590 00001A3C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15591 00001A3D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15592 00001A3E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15593                                  
 15594                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15595                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15596                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15597                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15598 00001A40 BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15599                                  		;
 15600                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15601                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15602                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15603                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15604 00001A43 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15605 00001A46 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15606                                  		;
 15607 00001A49 FC                      		cld
 15608 00001A4A C3                      		retn
 15609                                  
 15610                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15611                                  
 15612                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15613                                  ;
 15614                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15615                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15616                                  
 15617                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15618 00001A4B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15619 00001A4C 56                      		push	si
 15620 00001A4D 51                      		push	cx
 15621                                  		
 15622                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15623                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15624                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15625                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15626                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15627                                  		;cld
 15628                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15629 00001A4E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15630                                  
 15631 00001A51 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15632 00001A53 59                      		pop	cx
 15633 00001A54 5E                      		pop	si
 15634 00001A55 5F                      		pop	di
 15635 00001A56 C3                      		retn
 15636                                  
 15637                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15638                                  
 15639                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15640                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15641                                  ;
 15642                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15643                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15644                                  
 15645                                  check_volume_id:
 15646 00001A57 57                      		push	di
 15647 00001A58 51                      		push	cx
 15648                                  		
 15649                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15650                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15651                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15652                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15653                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15654                                  		;cld
 15655                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15656 00001A59 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15657                                  
 15658 00001A5C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15659 00001A5E 59                      		pop	cx
 15660 00001A5F 5F                      		pop	di
 15661 00001A60 C3                      		retn
 15662                                  
 15663                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15664                                  
 15665                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15666                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15667                                  ;
 15668                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15669                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15670                                  ;
 15671                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15672                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15673                                  ;
 15674                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15675                                  
 15676                                  fat_check:		
 15677 00001A61 50                      		push	ax
 15678 00001A62 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15679 00001A64 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15680 00001A67 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15681                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15682 00001A6B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15683 00001A6D 4E                      		dec	si
 15684                                  okret1:					
 15685 00001A6E 58                      		pop	ax
 15686 00001A6F C3                      		retn
 15687                                  
 15688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15689                                  
 15690                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15691                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15692                                  
 15693                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15694                                  
 15695                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15696                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15697                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15698                                  
 15699                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15700                                  
 15701                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15702                                  		;db 0
 15703                                  
 15704                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15705                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15706                                  
 15707                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15708 00001A70 00<rep 10h>             		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15709                                  %endif
 15710                                  
 15711                                  ;align 16
 15712                                  
 15713                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15714                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15715                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15716                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15717                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15718                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15719                                  
 15720                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 15721                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 15722
