 32168 00002D89 C3                      	retn
 32169                                  
 32170                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32171                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32172                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32173                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32174                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32175                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32176                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32177                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32178                                  
 32179                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32180                                  BigFree:
 32181                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32182                                  	;push	bx
 32183 00002D8A 51                      	push	cx
 32184                                  
 32185 00002D8B E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32186 00002D8E 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 32187                                  
 32188 00002D90 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32189 00002D92 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32190                                  
 32191                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32192                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32193                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32194                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32196                                  
 32197                                  bf10:	
 32198 00002D94 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32199 00002D97 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32200                                  
 32201                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32202 00002D99 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32203 00002D9F 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32204                                  
 32205 00002DA1 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32206                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32207 00002DA5 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32208                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32209                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32210 00002DA7 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32211                                  
 32212 00002DA9 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32213                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32214 00002DAB 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32215                                  
 32216                                  bf20:	
 32217                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32218                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32219                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32220                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32221 00002DAD 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32222 00002DB3 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32223                                  
 32224                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32225 00002DB5 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32226                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32227 00002DB7 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32228 00002DBC 40                      	inc     ax
 32229 00002DBD 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32230                                  
 32231 00002DBF EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32232                                  
 32233 00002DC1 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32234 00002DC3 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32235 00002DC5 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32236 00002DC7 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32237                                  bfE:	
 32238 00002DC9 F9                      	stc
 32239                                  bfX:
 32240 00002DCA 59                      	pop	cx
 32241                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32242                                  	;pop	bx
 32243 00002DCB C3                      	retn
 32244                                  
 32245                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32246                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32247                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32248                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32249                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32250                                  ; ERROR:    None

 32264                                  	;
 32265                                  	;push	ds

 32274 00002DD0 8A87[361F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]

 32277

 32282 00002DD6 C3                      	retn
 32283                                  
 32284                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32285                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32286                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32287                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32288                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32289                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32290                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32291                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32292                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32293                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32294                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32295                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32296                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32297                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32298                                  
 32299                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 32300                                  
 32301                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32302                                  
 32303                                  shrinkMCB:
 32304                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32305                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32306                                  	;push	bx
 32307 00002DD7 51                      	push	cx
 32308 00002DD8 06                      	push	es
 32309                                  
 32310 00002DD9 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32311                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32312                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32313                                  
 32314 00002DDB 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32315                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32316 00002DE0 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32317                                  
 32318 00002DE2 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32319                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32320                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32321                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32322                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32323                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32324                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32325 00002DE5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32326 00002DE7 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32327                                  
 32328 00002DE9 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32329                                  	
 32330                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32331                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32332 00002DEE 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32333                                  
 32334 00002DF0 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32335 00002DF5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32336                                  
 32337 00002DFB 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32338 00002DFD 40                      	inc	ax
 32339 00002DFE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32340                                  
 32341 00002E00 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32342 00002E02 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32343                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32344                                  	; ax > 0
 32345 00002E04 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32346                                  
 32347                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32348 00002E05 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32349                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32350 00002E0A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32351                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32352                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32353                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32354                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32355                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32356                                  
 32357                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32358 00002E0E E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32359                                  
 32360                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32361                                  	; cf=0
 32362                                  	;clc
 32363                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32364                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32365                                  smE:	
 32366                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32367                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32368                                  	;stc
 32369                                  smX:	
 32370                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32371 00002E11 07                      	pop	es
 32372 00002E12 59                      	pop	cx
 32373                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32374                                  	;pop	bx
 32375 00002E13 C3                      	retn
 32376                                  
 32377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32378                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32379                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32380                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32381                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32382                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32383                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32384                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32385                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32386                                  ;
 32387                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32388                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32389                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32390                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32391                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32392                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32393                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32394                                  ;       Endif
 32395                                  ;    Endif
 32396                                  ; Endif
 32397                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32398                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32399                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32400                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32401                                  ;    ENDIF
 32402                                  ; ENDIF
 32403                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32404                                  
 32405                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32406                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32407                                  _hideUMB_:
 32408                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32409                                  	; ds = cs
 32410                                  
 32411                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32412                                  	;push	bx
 32413                                  	;push	dx
 32414 00002E14 06                      	push	es
 32415                                  
 32416 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32417 00002E17 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32418 00002E1A 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32419                                  
 32420 00002E1C 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32421 00002E1E E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32422 00002E21 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32423                                  
 32424 00002E23 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32425 00002E24 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32426 00002E26 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32427 00002E29 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32428                                  
 32429 00002E2A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32430 00002E2C 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32431                                  
 32432 00002E2E 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32433 00002E30 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32434                                  
 32435 00002E32 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32436 00002E34 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32437 00002E37 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32438                                  hu_10:	
 32439                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32440                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32441                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32442                                  ;isTiny:
 32443                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32444                                  	;or	al,al
 32445 00002E39 800E[321F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32446 00002E3E 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32447                                  
 32448 00002E40 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32449 00002E43 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32450                                  
 32451 00002E45 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32452 00002E47 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32453                                  
 32454 00002E49 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32455 00002E4B E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32456 00002E4E 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32457                                  
 32458 00002E50 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32459                                  hu_30:	
 32460 00002E52 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32461                                  
 32462 00002E54 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32463                                  
 32464 00002E57 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32465 00002E59 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32466                                  
 32467 00002E5B 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32468 00002E5D E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32469                                  hu_X:	
 32470 00002E60 07                      	pop	es
 32471                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32472                                  	;pop	dx
 32473                                  	;pop	bx
 32474 00002E61 C3                      	retn
 32475                                  
 32476                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32477                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32478                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32479                                  ; Entry:  None
 32480                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32481                                  ; Error:  None
 32482                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32483                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32484                                  
 32485                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32486                                  UnFreeze:
 32487                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32488                                  	;push	ax
 32489 00002E62 06                      	push	es
 32490                                  
 32491 00002E63 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32492 00002E66 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 32493                                  
 32494                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32495                                  uf10:
 32496 00002E68 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32497                                  
 32498                                  ; ------------------------------
 32499                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32500                                  ; ------------------------------
 32501                                  
 32502                                  ;uf10:	
 32503 00002E6A E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32504 00002E6D 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 32505 00002E6F E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 32506                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32507                                  	; ax <> es
 32508 00002E72 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 32509                                  uf20:	
 32510                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32511                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32512                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32513 00002E74 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32514 00002E7A 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32515                                  
 32516                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32517                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32518                                  	; ax = es
 32519                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 32520                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32521 00002E7C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32522 00002E81 40                      	inc	ax
 32523                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32524                                  	;mov	es,ax
 32525 00002E82 EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 32526                                  ufX:	
 32527 00002E84 07                      	pop	es
 32528                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32529                                  	;pop	ax
 32530 00002E85 C3                      	retn
 32531                                  
 32532                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32533                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 32534                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32535                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32536                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32537                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32538                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32539                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32540                                  
 32541                                  isFrozMCB:
 32542                                  	;push	ax
 32543                                  
 32544                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32545                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32546 00002E86 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32547 00002E8C 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 32548                                  
 32549                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32550                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32551 00002E8E 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32552 00002E95 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 32553                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32554                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32555 00002E97 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32556 00002E9E 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 32557                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32558                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32559 00002EA0 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32560 00002EA7 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 32561                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32562                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32563 00002EA9 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32564                                  ifmX:	
 32565                                  	;pop	ax
 32566 00002EB0 C3                      	retn
 32567                                  
 32568                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32569                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32570                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32585                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32586                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32587                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32588                                  ; Entry:  None
 32589                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 32590                                  ; Error:  None
 32591                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32592                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32593                                  
 32594                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2  
 32595                                  FreezeUM:
 32596                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32597                                  	;push	ax
 32598                                  	;push	cx
 32599                                  	;push	dx
 32600 00002ED5 06                      	push	es
 32601                                  
 32602                                  	;;call	GetLoadUMB
 32603                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32604                                  	; ds = cs
 32605                                  	;mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32606 00002ED6 A0[351F]                	mov	al,[UmbLoad] 	
 32607                                  
 32608 00002ED9 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32609 00002EDB 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 32610                                  
 32611 00002EDD E85BFD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32612                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32613                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32614 00002EE0 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32615                                  
 32616                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32617                                  fum10:
 32618 00002EE2 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32619                                  
 32620                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32621                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 32622                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 32623                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 32624                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32625                                  
 32626                                  ;fum10:	
 32627 00002EE4 E861FD                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32628 00002EE7 7501                    	jnz	short fum20
 32629                                  
 32630 00002EE9 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32631                                  fum20:	
 32632 00002EEA 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 32633 00002EEC 740B                    	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 32634                                  
 32635                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 32636 00002EEE 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32637 00002EF4 7503                    	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 32638

 32640                                  fum30:

 33077                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33078                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 33079                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33080                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33081                                  
 33082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33083                                  ;
 33084                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33085                                  ;
 33086                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33087                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33088                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33089                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33090                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33091                                  ;
 33092                                  ;	Output : none
 33093                                  ;
 33094                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33095                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33096                                  ;
 33097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33098                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33099                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33100                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33101                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33103                                  
 33104                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33105                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33106                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33107                                  InitDevLoad:
 33108                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33109                                  	;push	es ; *
 33110                                  
 33111                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33112                                  	; ds = cs
 33113 00002FF3 803E[871F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33114                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33115                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33116 00002FF8 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33117                                  
 33118                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33119                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33120                                  ; %if 0
 33121                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33122 00002FFA 803E[771F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33123                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33124 00002FFF 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33125                                  
 33126                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33127                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33128                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33129                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33130                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33131                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33132                                  
 33133 00003001 E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33134                                  
 33135 00003004 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33136 00003007 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33137 0000300A E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33138 0000300D 9C                      	pushf
 33139 0000300E E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33140 00003011 9D                      	popf
 33141                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33142                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33143                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33144 00003012 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33145

 33264                                  ;
 33265                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33266                                  ;
 33267                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33268                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33269                                  ;		 the device.
 33270                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33271                                  ;

 33273                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33274                                  ;	UMB.
 33275                                  ;
 33276                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33277                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33278                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33279                                  ;
 33280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33281                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 33297

 33299                                  	; 11/12/2022

 33302                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx

 33306                                  
 33307 00003078 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33308 0000307B CD21                    	int	21h
 33309 0000307D 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33310                                  
 33311                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33312                                  	;dec	ax
 33313                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33314                                  	;
 33315                                  PrepareMark:
 33316 0000307F 1E                      	push	ds
 33317 00003080 48                      	dec	ax

 33320 00003089 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h

 33322 00003090 1F                      	pop	ds
 33323                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33324                                  	; ds = cs

 33351                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0

 33366                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33367                                  ;
 33368                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33369                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33370                                  ;
 33371                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33372                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena

 33401                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there

 33406                                  dsm_again:

 33408 000030BC 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33409 000030BE 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33410 000030C0 89F7                    	mov	di,si

 33442 000030ED 07                      	pop	es

 33895                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33896                                  ;
 33897                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33898                                  ;
 33899                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33900                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33901                                  ;
 33902                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33903                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33904                                  ;
 33905                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33906                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33907                                  ;
 33908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33909                                  
 33910                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33911                                  
 33912                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33913                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33914                                  
 33915                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33916                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33917                                  GetHexNum:
 33918 00003227 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33919 00003229 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33920                                  ghn_next:
 33921 0000322B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33922 0000322E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33923 00003231 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33924 00003233 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33925 00003236 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33926 00003238 50                      	push	ax
 33927 00003239 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33928 0000323B E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 33929 0000323E 58                      	pop	ax
 33930                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33931 0000323F B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33932 00003242 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33933 00003244 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33934                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33935                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33936 00003247 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33937                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33938                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33939                                  ghn_shift1:
 33940 00003249 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33941 0000324B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33942 0000324D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33943 0000324F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33944 00003251 46                      	inc	si
 33945 00003252 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33946                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33947 00003254 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33948 00003257 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33949 0000325A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33950 0000325E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33951                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33952                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33953                                  ghn_shift2:
 33954 00003260 F8                      	clc
 33955 00003261 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33956 00003263 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33957 00003265 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33958 00003267 F8                      	clc
 33959 00003268 C3                      	retn
 33960                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33961                                  ghn_err:
 33962                                  gnib_err:
 33963 00003269 F9                      	stc
 33964                                  ghn_ret:
 33965                                  gnib_ret:
 33966 0000326A C3                      	retn

 33969                                  ;
 33970                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 33971                                  ;
 33972                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33973                                  ;
 33974                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 33975                                  ;
 33976                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33977                                  ;
 33978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33979                                  
 33980                                  GetNibble:
 33981 0000326B 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 33982                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33983                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33984 0000326E 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33985 00003270 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 33986 00003273 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 33987 00003275 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 33988 00003278 C3                      	retn
 33989                                  is_it_hex:
 33990 00003279 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 33991                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33992                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33993 0000327C 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33994 0000327E 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 33995 00003281 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 33996 00003283 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 33997 00003286 C3                      	retn
 33998                                  
 33999                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34000                                  ;gnib_err:
 34001                                  ;	stc
 34002                                  ;gnib_ret:
 34003                                  ;	retn

 34010                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34011                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 34012

 34014                                  XMM_RELEASE_UMB	equ 11h

 34017                                  
 34018                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34019                                  ;
 34020                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34021                                  ;
 34022                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34023                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34024                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34025                                  ;			; DS = data
 34026                                  ;
 34027                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34028                                  ;
 34029                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34030                                  ;
 34031                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34032                                  
 34033                                  umb_insert:
 34034 00003287 1E                      	push	ds
 34035                                  
 34036                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34037                                  	; ds = cs
 34038                                  
 34039                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34040 00003288 8E1E[961F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34041                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34042 0000328C 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34043 00003290 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34044 00003292 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34045                                  ui_next:
 34046 00003294 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34047                                  					;    new block
 34048 00003296 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34049                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34050                                  					;    last
 34051 00003298 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34052 0000329E 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34053                                  					; N: get next block
 34054 000032A0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34055                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34056 000032A2 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34057 000032A5 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34058                                  
 34059                                  ui_insert:
 34060 000032A7 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34061 000032A9 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34062                                  
 34063 000032AA 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34064 000032AC F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34065                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34066 000032AE C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34067                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34068 000032B3 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34069                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34070 000032B9 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34071                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34072 000032BD C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34073                                  
 34074                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34075                                  
 34076 000032C3 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34077 000032C5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34078 000032CB 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34079                                  					; mark as free
 34080 000032D2 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34081                                  					; start & end of new block
 34082 000032D5 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34083                                  
 34084                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34085                                  	
 34086 000032DA 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34087 000032DC 43                      	inc	bx
 34088 000032DD 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34089 000032DF 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34090                                  
 34091                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34092                                  					; this block
 34093 000032E0 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34094                                  	
 34095 000032E2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34096 000032E8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34097 000032EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34098 000032F3 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34099                                  
 34100 000032FA EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34101                                  
 34102                                  ui_append:
 34103                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34104 000032FC 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34105 00003301 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34106                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34107                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34108                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34109 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34110                                  
 34111 0000330D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34112 0000330F 40                      	inc	ax
 34113 00003310 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34114                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34115 00003312 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34116                                  
 34117 00003314 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34118                                  
 34119 00003316 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34120 0000331C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34121 00003323 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34122 00003327 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34123                                  
 34124                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34125 0000332E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34126 00003330 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34127 00003336 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34128                                  					; mark as free
 34129 0000333D 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34130 0000333E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34131                                  ui_done:
 34132                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34133 00003343 1F                      	pop	ds
 34134                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34135                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34136                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34137 00003344 C3                      	retn

 34174                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34175                                  ;
 34176                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34177                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34178                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34179                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34180                                  ;
 34181                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34182                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34183                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34184                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34185                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34186                                  ;
 34187                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34188                                  
 34189                                  umb_coalesce:
 34190                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34191                                  	; ds = cs
 34192 00003354 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34193                                  
 34194 00003355 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34195                                  
 34196                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34197                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34198 00003357 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34199 0000335B 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34200                                  uc_nextfree:
 34201 00003360 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34202 00003362 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34203                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34204 00003364 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34205 00003369 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34206                                  					; N: get next arena
 34207 0000336B E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34208 0000336E 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34209 00003370 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34210                                  uc_again:
 34211 00003372 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34212 00003375 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34213                                  uc_check:
 34214 00003377 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34215 0000337C 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34216                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34217 0000337E 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34218 00003383 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34219                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34220 00003384 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34221 00003388 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34222 0000338B 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34223 0000338D EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34224                                  
 34225                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34226                                  ;uc_done:
 34227                                  	;retn
 34228

 34237                                  	; ds = cs

 34240 00003394 B452                    	mov	ah,52h

 34242                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34243                                  	; ds = cs
 34244                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 34245 00003398 8C06[961F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 34246 0000339C B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 34247 0000339F CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 34252                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34253 000033A9 803E[951F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0

 34276                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34277                                  ;
 34278                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34279                                  ;
 34280                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34281                                  ;
 34282                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34283                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34284                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34285                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34286                                  ;				NC
 34287                                  ;			  else 
 34288                                  ;				CY
 34289                                  ;
 34290                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34291                                  ;
 34292                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34293                                  
 34294                                  umb_allocate:
 34295                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34296                                  	; ds = cs
 34297 000033BD 50                      	push	ax
 34298 000033BE B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16

 34300                                  					;   possible
 34301                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34302 000033C3 FF1E[7F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34303                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34304                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34305                                  					; the largest UMB
 34306 000033C7 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34307 000033C9 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34308                                  	
 34309 000033CB B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34310                                  
 34311                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34313                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34314

 34316                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34317                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34318 000033D4 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34319                                  ua_err:
 34320 000033D6 F9                      	stc	
 34321                                  
 34322                                  	;clc
 34323                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34324                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34325                                  	; cf=0
 34326                                  	;clc 
 34327                                  ua_done:
 34328 000033D7 58                      	pop	ax
 34329 000033D8 C3                      	retn
 34330                                  	; 27/07/2023

 34336                                  ;
 34337                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34338                                  ;
 34339                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 34340                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34341                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 34342                                  ;

 34344                                  
 34345                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34346                                  get_next:
 34347 000033D9 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34348 000033DE 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 34349                                  _get_next_:
 34350 000033E0 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 34351 000033E2 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34352 000033E6 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34353 000033E7 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34354                                  	;clc
 34355                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34356                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34357                                  	; cf=0
 34358                                  	;clc
 34359 000033E9 C3                      	retn
 34360                                  gn_err:
 34361 000033EA F9                      	stc
 34362                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 34363                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 34364 000033EB C3                      	retn

 34367                                  ;
 34368                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34369                                  ;
 34370                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34371                                  
 34372                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34373                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34374                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34375                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34376                                  	; ds = cs
 34377 000033EC E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate

 34379                                  
 34380                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 34381                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34382                                  
 34383                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34384                                  	; ds = cs
 34385

 34387 000033F3 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34388 000033F5 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34389                                  
 34390 000033F7 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34391 000033F9 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34392                                  
 34393 000033FB F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34394                                  
 34395                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34396                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34397 000033FD 49                      	dec	cx
 34398 000033FE 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34399                                  	
 34400 00003400 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34401 00003406 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34402                                  					
 34403 0000340D 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34404 00003411 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34405                                  
 34406                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 34407                                  
 34408 00003418 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 34409 0000341A 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34410 00003420 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34411                                  					; mark as free 
 34412 00003427 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34413 00003428 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34414                                  
 34415                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34416                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34417 0000342D 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34418 00003431 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34419 00003434 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34420                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34421                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34422                                  
 34423                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 34424                                  
 34425 00003437 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34426 0000343A 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34427 0000343D 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34428                                  ;scan_next
 34429                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34430                                  scannext:
 34431 0000343F 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34432 00003443 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34433

 34435 00003447 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34436 0000344C 40                      	inc	ax
 34437 0000344D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34438                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34439                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34440 0000344F EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34441                                  got_last:
 34442                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34443                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34444 00003451 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34445                                  
 34446 00003456 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34447                                  	;clc
 34448                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34449                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34450                                  	; cf=0
 34451                                  	;clc
 34452 0000345C C3                      	retn
 34453                                  
 34454                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34455                                  ;;lfu_err:
 34456                                  ;	;stc
 34457                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34458                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 34459                                  ;	; cf=1
 34460                                  ;	;stc
 34461                                  ;	retn

 34464                                  ;
 34465                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34466                                  ;
 34467                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34468                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool

 34475 0000345D 833E[791F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0

 34481                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34482                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34483                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34484                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34485 00003465 8B1E[7D1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34486 00003469 2B1E[791F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34487 0000346D 8E06[791F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34488                                  	
 34489 00003471 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34490 00003474 CD21                    	int	21h
 34491                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34492                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34493                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34494 00003476 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34495 00003478 48                      	dec	ax
 34496 00003479 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34497 0000347B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34498                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34499                                  	;pop	bx
 34500 00003482 07                      	pop	es

 34519                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0

 34521                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34522 0000348D 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34523                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34524 00003491 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34525 00003496 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34526                                  ulu_next:
 34527 0000349B E83BFF                  	call	get_next
 34528 0000349E 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34529 000034A0 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34530 000034A2 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34531 000034A4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34532 000034A6 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34533                                  ulu_found:
 34534                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34535 000034A8 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34536                                  ulu_x:

 34538 000034AE 1F                      	pop	ds
 34539 000034AF C3                      	retn

 34541                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34542                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34543                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34544                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34545                                  
 34546                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34547                                  ;
 34548                                  ; Summary:
 34549                                  ;
 34550                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34551                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34552                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34553                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34554                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34555                                  ;
 34556                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34557                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34558                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34559                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34560                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34561                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34562                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34563                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34564                                  ;
 34565                                  ; Example:
 34566                                  ;
 34567                                  ;   [menu]
 34568                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34569                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34570                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34571                                  ;
 34572                                  ;   [network]
 34573                                  ;   include misc
 34574                                  ;   device=foo
 34575                                  ;
 34576                                  ;   [misc]
 34577                                  ;   device=bar
 34578                                  ;   include alternate
 34579                                  ;
 34580                                  ;   [alternate]
 34581                                  ;   device=tar
 34582                                  ;
 34583                                  ;
 34584                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34585                                  ;
 34586                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34587                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34588                                  ;
 34589                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34590                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34591                                  ;   following order:
 34592                                  ;
 34593                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34594                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34595                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34596                                  ;
 34597                                  
 34598                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34599                                  
 34600                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34601                                  
 34602                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34603                                  
 34604                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34605                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34606                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34607                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34608                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34609                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34610                                  
 34611                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34612                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34613                                  
 34614                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34615                                  
 34616                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34617                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34618                                  
 34619 000034B0 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34620

 34779                                  	je	short done_line

 34782

 34845                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34846                                  ;
 34847                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34848                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34849                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34850                                  ; error.

 34861                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)

 35120                                  ;
 35121                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35122                                  ;
 35123                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35124                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35125                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35126                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35127                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35128                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35129                                  ;
 35130                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35131                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35132                                  ;
 35133                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35134                                  ;
 35135                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35136                                  
 35137                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35138                                  
 35139                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35140                                  
 35141                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35142                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35143                                  
 35144                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35145                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35146                                  
 35147                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35148                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35149                                  	; ds = cs
 35150                                  
 35151 000035D5 06                      	push	es
 35152

 35154 000035D7 07                      	pop	es
 35155                                  
 35156 000035D8 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35157 000035DA 8A1E[4548]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35158 000035DE 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35159 000035E1 7506                    	jne	short got_80

 35161 000035E3 C706[4848]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35162                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35163                                  got_80:
 35164 000035E9 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 35165 000035EB 8BB7[EC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb

 35168                                  	; 02/11/2022

 35183 000035FE 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 35184
