 36462 00003BE8 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36463 00003BEC 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36464 00003BEE 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36465 00003BEF 8E1E[BE14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36466 00003BF3 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36467                                  
 36468                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36469                                  ;
 36470                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36471                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36472                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36473                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36474                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36475                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36476                                  ;
 36477                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36478                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36479                                  
 36480                                  copyblock_loop:
 36481 00003BF5 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36482 00003BF6 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36483 00003BF9 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36484 00003BFA 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36485                                  
 36486                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36487                                  
 36488                                  copyblock_begin:
 36489                                  
 36490                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36491                                  %if 0
 36492                                          push    ax              ;
 36493                                          push    cx              ;
 36494                                          push    si              ;
 36495                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36496                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36497                                          push    ds              ;
 36498                                          push    cs              ;
 36499                                          pop     ds              ;
 36500                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36501                                          pop     ds              ;
 36502                                          pop     di              ;
 36503                                          pop     si              ;
 36504                                          pop     cx              ;
 36505                                          pop     ax              ;
 36506                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36507                                  %endif
 36508                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36509 00003BFC 57                      	push	di
 36510 00003BFD BF[5A47]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36511 00003C00 E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36512 00003C03 5F                      	pop	di
 36513 00003C04 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36514                                  
 36515 00003C06 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36516 00003C08 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36517 00003C0A 57                              push    di              ;
 36518 00003C0B 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36519 00003C0D 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36520 00003C0E 06                              push    es              ;
 36521 00003C0F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36522 00003C10 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36523 00003C13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36524 00003C14 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36525                                  copyblock_check:
 36526 00003C15 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36527 00003C17 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36528 00003C19 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36529 00003C1C EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36530                                  
 36531                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36532 00003C1E E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36533 00003C21 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36534 00003C24 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36535 00003C26 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36536 00003C28 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36537 00003C2A 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36538 00003C2C EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36539                                  ;
 36540                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36541                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36542                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36543                                  ;
 36544                                  move_config:
 36545 00003C2E 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36546 00003C30 51                              push    cx              ;
 36547                                  ;
 36548                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36549                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36550                                  ;
 36551                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36552 00003C31 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36553 00003C34 BE[4D47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36554 00003C37 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36555                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36556                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36557                                  copy_boot: 
 36558                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36559 00003C38 2E                              cs
 36560 00003C39 AC                      	lodsb
 36561 00003C3A 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36562 00003C3C 47                              inc     di              ;
 36563 00003C3D E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36564                                  
 36565 00003C3F 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36566                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36567                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36568 00003C40 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36569 00003C42 2E8B36[1747]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36570 00003C47 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36571 00003C49 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36572 00003C4B 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36573 00003C4C 07                              pop     es              ;
 36574 00003C4D BE[5A47]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36575 00003C50 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36576 00003C53 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36577 00003C56 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36578 00003C58 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36579 00003C5A 46                              inc     si              ;
 36580 00003C5B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36581 00003C5C E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36582 00003C5E C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36583 00003C61 07                              pop     es              ;
 36584                                  
 36585                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36586                                  
 36587 00003C62 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36588 00003C64 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36589 00003C69 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36590 00003C6B 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36591                                  
 36592 00003C6C 51                              push    cx              ;
 36593 00003C6D F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36594 00003C6F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36595 00003C70 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36596 00003C72 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36597                                  
 36598                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36599                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36600                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36601                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36602                                  ;   is empty.
 36603                                  
 36604 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;
 36605 00003C74 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36606 00003C76 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36607 00003C77 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 36608 00003C7D E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36609 00003C80 07                              pop     es
 36610                                  
 36611                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36612                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36613                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36614                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36615                                  
 36616                                  menu_done:
 36617 00003C81 803E[0C47]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36618 00003C86 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36619 00003C88 06                              push    es              ;
 36620 00003C89 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36621 00003C8C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36622 00003C8E A1[1247]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36623 00003C91 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36624 00003C95 A0[1147]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36625 00003C98 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36626 00003C9C 07                              pop     es              ;
 36627                                  menu_exit:
 36628 00003C9D 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36629 00003CA1 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36630                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 36631                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36632                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36633                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36634 00003CA5 C3                      	retn
 36635                                  
 36636                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36637                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36638                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36639                                  
 36640                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36641                                  ;
 36642                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36643                                  ;
 36644                                  ;   INPUT
 36645                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36646                                  ;
 36647                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36648                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36649                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36650                                  ;
 36651                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36652                                  ;       None
 36653                                  ;
 36654                                  ;   NOTES
 36655                                  ;       None
 36656                                  ;
 36657                                  ;   HISTORY
 36658                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36659                                  ;
 36660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36661                                  
 36662                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36663                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36664                                  
 36665                                  copy_envvar:
 36666 00003CA6 51                              push    cx              ;
 36667 00003CA7 56                              push    si              ;
 36668 00003CA8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36669 00003CA9 06                              push    es              ;
 36670 00003CAA 06                              push    es              ;
 36671 00003CAB 8E06[BE14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36672 00003CAF 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36673                                  
 36674                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36675                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36676                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36677                                  ;
 36678                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36679                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36680                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36681                                  
 36682 00003CB0 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36683                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36684 00003CB2 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36685 00003CB3 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36686                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36687 00003CB5 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36688 00003CB7 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36689                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36690 00003CB9 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36691 00003CBB 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36692                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36693 00003CBD 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36694 00003CBF 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36695 00003CC0 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36696 00003CC2 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36697 00003CC4 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36698 00003CC6 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36699 00003CC8 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36700 00003CCA 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36701 00003CCB 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36702                                  copy_varsrch:
 36703 00003CCD 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36704 00003CD0 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36705 00003CD2 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36706 00003CD4 51                              push    cx              ;
 36707 00003CD5 56                              push    si              ;
 36708 00003CD6 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36709 00003CD8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36710 00003CD9 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36711 00003CDA 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36712 00003CDC 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36713 00003CE0 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36714                                  
 36715                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36716                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36717                                  
 36718 00003CE2 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36719 00003CE5 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36720 00003CE7 56                              push    si              ;
 36721 00003CE8 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36722 00003CEA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36723 00003CEC 2E8B0E[BC14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36724 00003CF1 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36725                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36726                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36727                                  
 36728 00003CF3 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36729 00003CF4 26                      	es	; 26h
 36730 00003CF5 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36731                                  
 36732 00003CF6 5E                      	pop     si
 36733                                  copy_envprep:
 36734 00003CF7 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36735 00003CFA 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36736 00003CFC 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36737 00003CFF 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36738                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36739                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36740                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36741 00003D01 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36742 00003D02 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36743 00003D04 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36744 00003D06 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36745 00003D08 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36746 00003D0A AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36747 00003D0B EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36748                                  
 36749                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36750 00003D0D 51                              push    cx              ;
 36751 00003D0E B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36752 00003D11 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36753 00003D13 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36754 00003D14 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36755                                  
 36756                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36757                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36758                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36759                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36760                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36761                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36762                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36763                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36764                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36765                                  
 36766                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36767 00003D16 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36768 00003D18 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36769                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36770 00003D19 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36771 00003D1C 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36772                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 36773 00003D21 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 36774                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36775 00003D22 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 36776 00003D23 07                              pop     es              ;
 36777 00003D24 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36778 00003D25 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36779 00003D26 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36780                                  
 36781                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36782 00003D27 C3                              retn
 36783                                  
 36784                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36785                                  ;
 36786                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36787                                  ;
 36788                                  ;   INPUT
 36789                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36790                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36791                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36792                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36793                                  ;
 36794                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36795                                  ;       Same as above
 36796                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36797                                  ;
 36798                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36799                                  ;       All
 36800                                  ;
 36801                                  ;   NOTES
 36802                                  ;       None
 36803                                  ;
 36804                                  ;   HISTORY
 36805                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36806                                  ;
 36807                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36808                                  
 36809                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36810                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36811                                  
 36812                                  copy_block:
 36813 00003D28 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36814 00003D2B 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36815 00003D2D 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36816 00003D2F 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36817 00003D31 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36818                                  
 36819 00003D33 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36820 00003D35 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36821 00003D37 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36822                                  
 36823                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36824                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36825                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36826                                  
 36827 00003D39 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36828 00003D3E 57                              push    di              ;
 36829                                  
 36830 00003D3F BF[5547]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36831 00003D42 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36832 00003D45 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36833                                  
 36834 00003D47 BF[5A47]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36835 00003D4A E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36836 00003D4D 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36837                                  
 36838 00003D4F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36839 00003D51 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36840 00003D54 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36841                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36842                                  	;pop    di              ;
 36843 00003D56 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36844 00003D58 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 36845 00003D59 51                              push    cx              ;
 36846 00003D5A 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36847 00003D5C 56                              push    si              ;
 36848 00003D5D 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36849 00003D5E 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36850 00003D60 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36851 00003D63 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36852 00003D66 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36853 00003D67 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36854 00003D68 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36855 00003D6A EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36856                                  
 36857                                  copy_error:
 36858                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36859 00003D6C F8                      	clc
 36860                                  copy_skip:
 36861 00003D6D 5F                              pop     di
 36862                                  ;copy_error:
 36863                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 36864                                  	;clc                    ;
 36865 00003D6E E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36866 00003D71 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36867                                  
 36868                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36869                                  
 36870                                  copy_line:
 36871 00003D73 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36872 00003D75 47                              inc     di              ;
 36873 00003D76 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36874 00003D78 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36875 00003D7A 2E803E[C114]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36876 00003D80 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36877 00003D82 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36878 00003D85 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36879 00003D87 47                              inc     di              ;
 36880 00003D88 47                              inc     di              ;
 36881 00003D89 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36882                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36883 00003D8B E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 36884 00003D8E 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36885 00003D90 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36886 00003D92 47                              inc     di              ;
 36887                                  copy_next:
 36888 00003D93 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36889 00003D95 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36890                                  
 36891                                  copy_nextline:
 36892 00003D97 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36893 00003D9A EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36894                                  
 36895                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36896                                  ;copy_done:
 36897                                          ;retn
 36898                                  
 36899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36900                                  ;
 36901                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36902                                  ;
 36903                                  ;   INPUT
 36904                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36905                                  ;
 36906                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36907                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36908                                  ;
 36909                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36910                                  ;       DX
 36911                                  ;
 36912                                  ;   NOTES
 36913                                  ;       None
 36914                                  ;
 36915                                  ;   HISTORY
 36916                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36917                                  ;
 36918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36919                                  
 36920                                  get_linenum:
 36921 00003D9C 50                              push    ax              ;
 36922 00003D9D 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36923 00003D9F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36924 00003DA0 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36925 00003DA2 56                              push    si              ;
 36926 00003DA3 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36927 00003DA8 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36928                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36929 00003DAA E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 36930 00003DAD 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36931 00003DAF 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36932 00003DB0 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36933 00003DB2 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36934                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36935 00003DB4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36936 00003DB5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36937 00003DB6 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36938 00003DB7 C3                              retn
 36939                                  
 36940                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36941                                  ;
 36942                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36943                                  ;
 36944                                  ;   INPUT
 36945                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36946                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36947                                  ;
 36948                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36949                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36950                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36951                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36952                                  ;
 36953                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36954                                  ;       None
 36955                                  ;
 36956                                  ;   NOTES
 36957                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36958                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36959                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36960                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36961                                  ;
 36962                                  ;   HISTORY
 36963                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36964                                  ;
 36965                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36966                                  
 36967                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36968 00003DB8 50                              push    ax              ;
 36969 00003DB9 51                              push    cx              ;
 36970 00003DBA 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36971 00003DBF 56                              push    si              ;
 36972 00003DC0 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36973 00003DC2 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36974 00003DC3 06                              push    es              ;
 36975 00003DC4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36976 00003DC5 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 36977 00003DC8 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 36978 00003DCA 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 36979 00003DCC 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36980 00003DCD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36981 00003DCE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36982 00003DCF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36983                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36984 00003DD0 C3                              retn			;
 36985                                  
 36986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36987                                  ;
 36988                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36989                                  ;
 36990                                  ;   INPUT
 36991                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36992                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36993                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36994                                  ;
 36995                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36996                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36997                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36998                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36999                                  ;
 37000                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37001                                  ;       AX
 37002                                  ;
 37003                                  ;   NOTES
 37004                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37005                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37006                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37007                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37008                                  ;
 37009                                  ;   HISTORY
 37010                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37011                                  ;
 37012                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37013                                  
 37014                                  find_block:
 37015 00003DD1 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37016 00003DD4 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37017 00003DD6 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37018 00003DD8 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37019 00003DDA 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37020 00003DDC 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37021 00003DDE 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37022 00003DE0 2E800E[C114]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37023 00003DE6 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37024                                  check_line:
 37025 00003DE8 2E800E[C114]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37026 00003DEE E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37027 00003DF1 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37028                                  next_line:
 37029 00003DF3 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37030 00003DF6 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37031                                  ;find_exit:
 37032                                  ;	retn
 37033                                  
 37034                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37035                                  ;
 37036                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37037                                  ;
 37038                                  ;   INPUT
 37039                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37040                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37041                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37042                                  ;
 37043                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37044                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37045                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37046                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37047                                  ;
 37048                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37049                                  ;       AX
 37050                                  ;
 37051                                  ;   NOTES
 37052                                  ;       None
 37053                                  ;
 37054                                  ;   HISTORY
 37055                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37056                                  ;
 37057                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37058                                  
 37059                                  comp_names:
 37060 00003DF8 57                              push    di              ;
 37061                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37062 00003DF9 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37063 00003DFC 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37064 00003DFE E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37065 00003E01 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37066 00003E03 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37067 00003E05 47                              inc     di              ;
 37068 00003E06 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37069                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37070 00003E09 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37071 00003E0B 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37072 00003E0D F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37073                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37074 00003E0E 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37075 00003E0F C3                              retn			;
 37076                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37077 00003E10 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37078 00003E12 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37079 00003E15 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37080 00003E17 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37081                                  
 37082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37083                                  
 37084                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37085                                  comp_names_x:
 37086                                  	;
 37087                                  comp_names_safe:
 37088 00003E19 50                              push    ax
 37089 00003E1A 51                              push    cx
 37090 00003E1B 56                              push	si
 37091 00003E1C 1E                              push    ds
 37092 00003E1D 0E                              push    cs
 37093 00003E1E 1F                              pop     ds
 37094 00003E1F E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37095 00003E22 1F                              pop     ds
 37096 00003E23 5E                      	pop	si
 37097 00003E24 59                              pop     cx
 37098 00003E25 58                              pop     ax
 37099 00003E26 C3                              retn
 37100                                  
 37101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37102                                  ;
 37103                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 37104                                  ;
 37105                                  ;   INPUT
 37106                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37107                                  ;
 37108                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37109                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37110                                  ;
 37111                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37112                                  ;       None
 37113                                  ;
 37114                                  ;   NOTES
 37115                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37116                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37117                                  ;
 37118                                  ;   HISTORY
 37119                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37120                                  ;
 37121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37122                                  
 37123                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37124                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37125                                  
 37126                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37127 00003E27 50                              push    ax              ;
 37128 00003E28 53                              push    bx              ;
 37129 00003E29 51                              push    cx              ;
 37130 00003E2A 52                              push    dx              ;
 37131 00003E2B 56                              push    si              ;
 37132 00003E2C B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37133 00003E2E 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37134 00003E32 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37135 00003E34 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37136 00003E35 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37137 00003E37 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37138 00003E39 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37139 00003E3C B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37140 00003E3E CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37141 00003E40 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37142 00003E42 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37143 00003E44 8A26[0B47]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37144 00003E48 3A1E[1547]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37145 00003E4C 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37146 00003E4E 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37147 00003E51 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37148 00003E53 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37149 00003E55 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37150 00003E57 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37151 00003E59 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37152 00003E5B 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37153                                  print_other:                    ;
 37154 00003E5E B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37155 00003E60 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37156 00003E62 8BBF[3947]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37157 00003E66 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37158 00003E68 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37159 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37160 00003E6E B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37161 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37162 00003E73 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37163 00003E75 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37164 00003E77 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37165                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37166 00003E79 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37167 00003E7C CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37168 00003E7E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37169 00003E80 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37170 00003E82 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37171                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37172 00003E84 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37173 00003E87 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37174 00003E89 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37175 00003E8B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37176 00003E8D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37177 00003E8F 06                              push    es              ;
 37178                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37179 00003E90 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37180 00003E93 47                              inc     di              ;
 37181 00003E94 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37182 00003E96 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37183 00003E98 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37184                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37185 00003E9A 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37186 00003E9C 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37187 00003E9E 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37188 00003EA0 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37189 00003EA2 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37190 00003EA4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37191 00003EA6 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37192 00003EA8 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37193 00003EAB 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37194 00003EAD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37195 00003EAF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37196 00003EB1 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37197                                  print_done:                     ;
 37198 00003EB3 07                              pop     es              ;
 37199 00003EB4 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37200 00003EB5 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37201 00003EB7 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37202 00003EB9 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37203 00003EBA 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37204 00003EBB 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37205 00003EBC 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37206 00003EBD 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37207 00003EBE C3                              retn			;
 37208                                  
 37209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37210                                  ;
 37211                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37212                                  ;
 37213                                  ;   INPUT
 37214                                  ;       None
 37215                                  ;
 37216                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37217                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37218                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37219                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37220                                  ;
 37221                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37222                                  ;       None
 37223                                  ;
 37224                                  ;   NOTES
 37225                                  ;       None
 37226                                  ;
 37227                                  ;   HISTORY
 37228                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37229                                  ;
 37230                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37231                                  
 37232                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37233 00003EBF 8A1E[1547]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37234 00003EC3 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37235 00003EC5 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37236 00003EC8 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37237 00003ECB 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37238 00003ED0 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37239 00003ED2 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37240 00003ED4 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37241 00003ED6 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37242                                  check_time:
 37243 00003ED8 A0[1947]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37244 00003EDB 2A06[1A47]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37245 00003EDF 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37246 00003EE1 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 37247 00003EE6 C606[1A47]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37248 00003EEB E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37249                                  show_time:
 37250 00003EEE 53                              push    bx              ;
 37251 00003EEF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37252 00003EF1 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37253 00003EF5 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37254 00003EF7 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37255 00003EF9 52                              push    dx              ;
 37256 00003EFA 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37257 00003EFD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37258 00003EFF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37259 00003F01 BA[CE4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37260 00003F04 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37261 00003F07 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37262 00003F09 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37263 00003F0A B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37264 00003F0C F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37265 00003F0E 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37266 00003F10 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37267 00003F12 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37268 00003F14 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37269 00003F16 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37270 00003F18 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37271 00003F1A B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37272 00003F1C CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37273 00003F1E 5A                              pop     dx
 37274 00003F1F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37275 00003F21 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37276 00003F23 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37277                                  input_key:
 37278 00003F24 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37279 00003F26 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37280 00003F28 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37281 00003F2A 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37282 00003F2C 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37283 00003F31 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37284 00003F33 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37285 00003F35 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37286 00003F37 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37287 00003F39 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37288 00003F3B 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37289 00003F3D 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37290 00003F3F B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37291                                  got_time:
 37292 00003F41 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37293 00003F43 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37294 00003F45 0036[1A47]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37295 00003F49 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37296                                  got_key:
 37297 00003F4B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37298 00003F4C B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37299 00003F4F 8706[1947]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37300 00003F53 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37301 00003F55 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37302 00003F57 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37303 00003F58 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37304 00003F5B 8B1E[0B47]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37305 00003F5F B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37306 00003F62 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37307 00003F64 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37308                                  
 37309                                  timeout_disabled:
 37310 00003F65 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37311 00003F66 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37312 00003F68 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37313 00003F6A CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37314 00003F6C 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37315                                  
 37316 00003F6E 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37317 00003F70 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37318 00003F72 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37319 00003F75 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37320 00003F77 FE0E[1547]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37321 00003F7B E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37322 00003F7E FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37323 00003F80 EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37324                                  not_up:
 37325 00003F82 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37326 00003F84 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37327 00003F86 3A1E[1647]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37328 00003F8A 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37329 00003F8C FE06[1547]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37330 00003F90 E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37331 00003F93 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37332                                  print1: 
 37333 00003F94 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37334                                  print2: 
 37335 00003F96 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37336 00003F99 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37337                                  to_input_key:
 37338 00003F9C EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37339                                  not_down:
 37340 00003F9E F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37341 00003FA3 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37342 00003FA5 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37343 00003FA7 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37344 00003FA9 8036[1447]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37345 00003FAE E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37346 00003FB1 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37347                                  not_f8:
 37348 00003FB4 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37349 00003FB6 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37350                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37351                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37352                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37353 00003FB8 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37354 00003FBD BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37355 00003FC0 B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37356 00003FC2 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37357                                  
 37358                                  normal_key:
 37359 00003FC4 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37360 00003FC6 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37361 00003FC8 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37362 00003FCA 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 37363 00003FCC BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 37364 00003FCF C3                              retn			;
 37365                                  not_backspace:
 37366 00003FD0 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 37367 00003FD2 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 37368 00003FD4 3A06[1647]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 37369 00003FD8 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37370 00003FDA A2[1547]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37371 00003FDD E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37372 00003FE0 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37373 00003FE2 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37374                                  
 37375                                  select_done:
 37376 00003FE4 B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 37377 00003FE6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37378 00003FE8 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37379                                  
 37380                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37381                                  
 37382                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37383                                  
 37384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37385                                  ;
 37386                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 37387                                  ;
 37388                                  ;   INPUT
 37389                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37390                                  ;
 37391                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37392                                  ;       None
 37393                                  ;
 37394                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37395                                  ;       None
 37396                                  ;
 37397                                  ;   NOTES
 37398                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37399                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37400                                  ;
 37401                                  ;   HISTORY
 37402                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37403                                  ;
 37404                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37405                                  
 37406                                  
 37407                                  disp_input:
 37408 00003FEA 50                      	push	ax
 37409                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 37410                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 37411                                  	;mov	al,' '
 37412                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 37413 00003FEB B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37414 00003FED 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37415 00003FEF 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37416                                  disp_ok:
 37417 00003FF1 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37418                                  disp_input_ok:
 37419 00003FF3 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37420 00003FF5 CD21                    	int	21h
 37421 00003FF7 BA[2E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37422 00003FFA E8E504                  	call	print
 37423 00003FFD 58                      	pop	ax
 37424 00003FFE C3                      	retn
 37425                                  
 37426                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37427                                  
 37428                                  disp_num:
 37429 00003FFF 53                              push    bx
 37430 00004000 0430                            add     al,'0'
 37431 00004002 B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 37432 00004004 8B1E[0B47]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37433 00004008 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 37434 0000400B CD10                            int     10h
 37435 0000400D 5B                              pop     bx
 37436 0000400E C3                              retn
 37437                                  
 37438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37439                                  ;
 37440                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 37441                                  ;
 37442                                  ;   INPUT
 37443                                  ;       None
 37444                                  ;
 37445                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37446                                  ;       None
 37447                                  ;
 37448                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37449                                  ;       None
 37450                                  ;
 37451                                  ;   NOTES
 37452                                  ;       None
 37453                                  ;
 37454                                  ;   HISTORY
 37455                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37456                                  ;
 37457                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37458                                  
 37459                                  show_status:
 37460 0000400F 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37461 00004010 8B1E[0B47]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37462 00004014 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37463 00004016 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37464 00004018 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37465 00004019 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37466 0000401B 8B16[0E47]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 37467 0000401F F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37468 00004024 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 37469 00004026 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 37470 00004028 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37471 0000402A B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37472 0000402D B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 37473                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37474                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 37475 00004030 EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 37476                                  show_onoff: 
 37477 00004032 CD10                            int     10h
 37478                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37479                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37480                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37481                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37482                                  
 37483 00004034 A0[CA4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 37484 00004037 803E[1447]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 37485 0000403C 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 37486 0000403E A0[C64C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 37487                                  show_noton:                     ;
 37488 00004041 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 37489                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 37490 00004043 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37491                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 37492 00004045 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37493 00004046 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37494 00004048 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 37495 0000404A 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37496 0000404B C3                              retn			;

 37498                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
