 37501                                  ;
 37502                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37503                                  ;
 37504                                  ;   INPUT
 37505                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37506                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37507                                  ;
 37508                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37509                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37510                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37511                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37512                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37513                                  ;
 37514                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37515                                  ;       AX
 37516                                  ;
 37517                                  ;   NOTES
 37518                                  ;       None
 37519                                  ;
 37520                                  ;   HISTORY
 37521                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37522                                  ;
 37523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37524                                  
 37525                                  skip_token:
 37526 0000404C E84D00                          call    get_char
 37527 0000404F 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37528 00004051 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37529 00004054 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37530                                  skip_check_eol:
 37531 00004056 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37532 00004058 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37533 0000405A 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37534 0000405C 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37535 0000405E F8                              clc
 37536                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37537 0000405F C3                      	retn
 37538                                  skip_token_eol:
 37539 00004060 F9                              stc
 37540                                  skip_token_done:
 37541 00004061 C3                              retn
 37542                                  
 37543                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37544                                  ;
 37545                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37546                                  ;
 37547                                  ;   INPUT
 37548                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37549                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37550                                  ;
 37551                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37552                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37553                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37554                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37555                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37556                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37557                                  ;
 37558                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37559                                  ;       AX
 37560                                  ;
 37561                                  ;   NOTES
 37562                                  ;       None
 37563                                  ;
 37564                                  ;   HISTORY
 37565                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37566                                  ;
 37567                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37568                                  
 37569                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37570 00004062 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37571 00004065 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37572 00004068 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37573 0000406A E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37574 0000406D 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37575 0000406F EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37576                                  
 37577                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37578                                  ;
 37579                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37580                                  ;
 37581                                  ;   INPUT
 37582                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37583                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37584                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37585                                  ;
 37586                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37587                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37588                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37589                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37590                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37591                                  ;
 37592                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37593                                  ;       AX
 37594                                  ;
 37595                                  ;   NOTES
 37596                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37597                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37598                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37599                                  ;
 37600                                  ;   HISTORY
 37601                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37602                                  ;
 37603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37604                                  
 37605                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37606                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37607                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37608                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37609                                       
 37610                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37611                                  
 37612                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37613                                  ;
 37614                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37615                                  ;
 37616                                  ;   INPUT
 37617                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37618                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37619                                  ;
 37620                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37621                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37622                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37623                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37624                                  ;
 37625                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37626                                  ;       AX
 37627                                  ;
 37628                                  ;   NOTES
 37629                                  ;       None
 37630                                  ;
 37631                                  ;   HISTORY
 37632                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37633                                  ;
 37634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37635                                  
 37636                                  skip_line:
 37637 00004071 E82800                          call    get_char
 37638 00004074 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37639                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37640 00004076 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37641 00004078 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37642                                  skip_line_done:
 37643                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37644 0000407A C3                              retn
 37645                                  
 37646                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37647                                  ;
 37648                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37649                                  ;
 37650                                  ;   INPUT
 37651                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37652                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37653                                  ;
 37654                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37655                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37656                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37657                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37658                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37659                                  ;
 37660                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37661                                  ;       AX
 37662                                  ;
 37663                                  ;   NOTES
 37664                                  ;       None
 37665                                  ;
 37666                                  ;   HISTORY
 37667                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37668                                  ;
 37669                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37670                                  
 37671                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37672                                  
 37673                                  get_number:
 37674 0000407B 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37675                                  num_loop:
 37676 0000407D E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37677 00004080 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37678 00004082 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37679 00004084 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37680 00004086 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37681 00004088 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37682 0000408A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37683 0000408B B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37684 0000408E 52                              push    dx              ;
 37685 0000408F F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37686 00004091 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37687 00004092 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37688 00004094 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37689 00004095 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37690 00004097 98                              cbw                     ;
 37691 00004098 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37692 0000409A EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37693                                  
 37694                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37695                                  ;num_done:
 37696                                          ;retn

 37698                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37699                                  ;
 37700                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37701                                  ;
 37702                                  ;   INPUT
 37703                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37704                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37705                                  ;
 37706                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37707                                  ;       AL == next character
 37708                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37709                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37710                                  ;
 37711                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37712                                  ;       AX
 37713                                  ;
 37714                                  ;   NOTES
 37715                                  ;       None
 37716                                  ;
 37717                                  ;   HISTORY
 37718                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37719                                  ;
 37720                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37721                                  
 37722                                  get_char:
 37723 0000409C 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37724 0000409F 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37725                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37726 000040A1 26                      	es	
 37727 000040A2 AC                      	lodsb
 37728 000040A3 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37729 000040A5 C3                              retn			;
 37730                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37731 000040A6 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37732                                  nearby_ret:
 37733 000040A9 C3                              retn

 37735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37736                                  ;
 37737                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37738                                  ;
 37739                                  ;   INPUT
 37740                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37741                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37742                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37743                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37744                                  ;
 37745                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37746                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37747                                  ;
 37748                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37749                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37750                                  ;
 37751                                  ;   NOTES
 37752                                  ;       None
 37753                                  ;
 37754                                  ;   HISTORY
 37755                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37756                                  ;
 37757                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37758                                  
 37759                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37760                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37761                                  
 37762                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37763                                  query_user:
 37764 000040AA F606[1447]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37765                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37766 000040AF 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37767 000040B1 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37768                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37769                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37770                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37771                                  qu_1:
 37772 000040B4 F606[1447]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37773 000040B9 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37774 000040BB 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37775 000040BC A0[C014]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37776 000040BF F606[1447]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37777 000040C4 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37778 000040C6 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37779                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37780 000040C8 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37781                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37782                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37783                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37784                                  
 37785                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37786 000040CA 58                      	pop	ax
 37787 000040CB C3                      	retn
 37788                                  
 37789                                  query_all:
 37790                                  
 37791                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37792                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37793                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37794                                  
 37795 000040CC 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37796 000040CD BA[204D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37797 000040D0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37798 000040D2 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37799                                  
 37800 000040D4 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37801 000040D6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37802 000040D8 BF[6147]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37803                                  find_match:                             ;
 37804 000040DB 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37805 000040DD 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37806 000040DF 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37807 000040E1 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37808 000040E2 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37809 000040E4 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37810 000040E6 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37811                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37812 000040E9 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37813                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37814 000040EB 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37815 000040EE B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37816 000040F0 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37817                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37818 000040F2 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37819 000040F4 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37820 000040F5 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37821 000040F7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37822 000040F9 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37823 000040FB B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37824 000040FD 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37825 00004100 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37826 00004102 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37827                                  cmd_notset:
 37828 00004104 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37829                                  line_print:                             ;
 37830                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37831 00004106 26                              es
 37832 00004107 AC                      	lodsb
 37833 00004108 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37834 0000410A 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37835 0000410C B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37836                                  non_null:                               ;
 37837 0000410E 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37838 00004110 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37839 00004112 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37840                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37841 00004114 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37842                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37843 00004117 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37844                                  non_space:                              ;
 37845 00004119 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37846 0000411B B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37847 0000411D CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37848 0000411F EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37849                                  
 37850                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37851 00004121 BA[BE4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37852                                  
 37853                                  generic_prompt:
 37854 00004124 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37855                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37856 00004127 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37857 00004129 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37858 0000412B 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37859 0000412D 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37860 0000412F 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37861 00004132 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37862 00004134 A0[CA4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37863 00004137 800E[1447]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37864 0000413C EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37865                                  not_func:
 37866 0000413E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37867 00004140 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37868 00004144 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37869 00004146 3A06[C64C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37870 0000414A 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37871 0000414C 803E[C014]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37872 00004151 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37873 00004153 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37874 00004155 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37875 00004157 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37876 0000415C A0[C64C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37877                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37878 0000415F E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37879 00004162 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37880                                  
 37881 00004163 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37882 00004167 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37883                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37884 00004169 F8                      	clc
 37885                                  do_cmd:
 37886 0000416A 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37887                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37888                                  	; cf=0
 37889                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37890 0000416B C3                      	retn
 37891                                  
 37892                                  skip_cmd:
 37893 0000416C 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37894                                  skip_all:
 37895 0000416D B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37896 0000416F F9                      	stc
 37897 00004170 C3                      	retn

 37948 000041A0 5A                              pop     dx

 37951 000041A3 58                              pop     ax

 37954                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37955                                  
 37956                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37957                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 37958                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37959                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37960                                  
 37961                                  disable_autoexec:
 37962                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37963                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37964                                  
 37965 000041A5 F606[1447]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37966 000041AA 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 37967 000041AC F606[0A47]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37968 000041B1 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 37969 000041B3 800E[0A47]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37970                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37971 000041B8 810E[1447]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37972 000041BE BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37973                                  dae_1:
 37974                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37975 000041C1 A0[4946]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37976                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar

 38142

 38150 00004256 1E                      	push	ds
 38151                                  
 38152 00004257 06                      	push	es
 38153 00004258 1F                      	pop	ds
 38154                                  
 38155                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38156                                  
 38157                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38158                                  
 38159                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38160 00004259 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38161                                  ;else
 38162                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38163                                  ;endif

 38165                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38166                                  	;xor	si, si
 38167                                  
 38168                                  convloop:
 38169 0000425B AC                      	lodsb
 38170 0000425C 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38171 0000425E 7209                    	jb	short noconv

 38173 00004262 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38174 00004264 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38175 00004266 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38176                                  noconv:
 38177                                  
 38178                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38179                                  
 38180                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38181                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38182                                  
 38183                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38184                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38185                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38186                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38187                                  ;
 38188 00004269 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38189 0000426C 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38190 0000426E 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38191 00004270 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes

 38321                                  ;
 38322                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38323                                  ;
 38324                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38325                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38326                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38327                                  ;
 38328                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38329                                  
 38330                                  getnum:
 38331 000042F3 53                      	push	bx
 38332 000042F4 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38333                                  b2:
 38334 000042F6 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38335 000042F9 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38336                                  
 38337 000042FB 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38338 000042FC 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38339                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38340                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38341 000042FD B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38342 000042FF F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38343 00004301 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38344 00004302 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38345 00004304 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38346 00004307 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38347                                  
 38348 00004309 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38349                                  
 38350 0000430A E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 38351 0000430D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38352 0000430F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38353 00004311 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38354 00004313 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38355 00004315 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38356 00004317 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38357 00004319 7417                    	je	short b15
 38358 0000431B 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38359 00004320 7410                    	je	short b15
 38360 00004322 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38361                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38362                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38363                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38364                                  	;nop
 38365 00004324 740C                    	je	short b15
 38366 00004326 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38367 00004328 7408                    	je	short b15
 38368 0000432A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38369 0000432C 7404                    	je	short b15
 38370 0000432E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38371 00004330 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38372                                  b15:
 38373 00004332 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38374 00004337 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38375                                  b1:
 38376 0000433C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38377 0000433E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38378 00004340 5B                      	pop	bx
 38379 00004341 C3                      	retn
 38380                                  badnum:
 38381                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38382                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38383 00004342 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38384                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38385 00004344 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38386 00004348 5B                      	pop	bx
 38387 00004349 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38388 0000434A C3                      	retn
 38389                                  
 38390                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38391                                  
 38392                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38393                                  
 38394                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38395                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38396                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38397                                  ;	si = 0
 38398                                  ;	ax = country id
 38399                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38400                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38401                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38402                                  ;
 38403                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38404                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38405                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38406                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38407                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38408                                  
 38409                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38410                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38411                                  
 38412                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38413                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 38414                                  
 38415 0000434B 57                      	push	di
 38416 0000434C 50                      	push	ax
 38417 0000434D 52                      	push	dx
 38418                                  
 38419 0000434E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38420 00004350 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38421 00004352 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38422 00004355 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38423 00004358 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38424                                  
 38425 0000435A 06                      	push	es
 38426 0000435B 56                      	push	si
 38427                                  
 38428 0000435C 0E                      	push	cs
 38429 0000435D 07                      	pop	es
 38430                                  
 38431 0000435E BF[AF45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38432 00004361 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38433 00004364 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38434                                  
 38435 00004366 5E                      	pop	si
 38436 00004367 07                      	pop	es
 38437 00004368 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38438                                  
 38439 0000436A 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38440 0000436D 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38441 00004370 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38442                                  
 38443 00004372 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38444 00004373 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38445 00004375 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38446 00004378 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38447 0000437B E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38448 0000437E 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38449                                  
 38450 00004380 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38451 00004382 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38452 00004386 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38453                                  
 38454 00004388 46                      	inc	si
 38455 00004389 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38456 0000438A 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38457 0000438B 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38458 0000438C 5F                      	pop	di
 38459                                  
 38460                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38461 0000438D 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38462 00004390 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38463                                  
 38464                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38465                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38466                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38467 00004392 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38468 00004394 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38469 00004396 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38470 00004399 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38471                                  
 38472                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38473 0000439B 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38474 0000439D 46                      	inc	si
 38475 0000439E 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38476 0000439F E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38477

 38658                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.

 38661                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38662                                  ;on return:
 38663                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38664                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38666

 38668                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)

 38726                                  
 38727                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38728                                  
 38729                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38730                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38731                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38732                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38733                                  ;
 38734                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38735                                  ;	 be moved.
 38736                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38737                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38738                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38739                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38740                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38741                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38742                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38743                                  
 38744 0000449B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38745 0000449C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38746 0000449F F9                      	stc
 38747 000044A0 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38748 000044A2 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38749 000044A3 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38750                                  
 38751 000044A5 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38752 000044A7 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38753 000044A9 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38754 000044AB F9                      	stc
 38755 000044AC CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38756                                  ricb_exit:
 38757 000044AE C3                      	retn

 38765                                  set_country_path:
 38766                                  
 38767                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38768                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38769                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38770                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38771                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38772                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38773                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38775                                  
 38776                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38777                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38778                                  
 38779                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38780                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38781                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38782                                  
 38783                                  	push	si
 38784                                  
 38785                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38786                                  	push	es
 38787                                  	pop	ds
 38788                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38789                                  
 38790                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38791                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38792                                  
 38793                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38794                                  	inc	si
 38795                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38796                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38797                                  
 38798                                  scp_default_drv:
 38799                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38800                                  	int	21h
 38801                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38802                                  
 38803                                  scp_setdrv:
 38804                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38805                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38806                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38807                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38808                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38809                                  
 38810                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38811                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38812                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38813                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38814                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38815                                  
 38816                                  scp_root_dir:
 38817                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38818                                  scp_path:
 38819                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38820                                  
 38821                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38822                                  scpath_exit:
 38823                                  
 38824                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38825                                  	push	es
 38826                                  	pop	ds
 38827                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38828                                  
 38829                                  	pop	si
 38830                                  	retn
 38831                                  
 38832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38833                                  
 38834                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38835                                  
 38836                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38837                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38838                                  ;carry set if not.
 38839                                  
 38840                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38841                                  
 38842                                  	push	ax
 38843                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38844                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38845                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38846                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38847                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38848                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38849                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38850                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38851                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38852                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
